source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000010_MINFILIA<tab>We have a guest from Ishgard who wishes to speak with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000010_MINFILIA<tab>Quelqu'un d'Ishgard est venu pour te voir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000020_MINFILIA<tab>I believe the two of you have met?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000020_MINFILIA<tab>Vous vous connaissez déjà, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000030_LUCIA<tab>We have. I had hoped to speak with Commander Leveilleur as well, but I cannot afford to wait any longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000030_LUCIA<tab>En effet. J'aurais aussi aimé parler au commandant Leveilleur, mais le temps presse malheureusement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000040_LUCIA<tab>The lord commander sent me hither to request your aid in a matter of grave import.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000040_LUCIA<tab>Messire Aymeric désire obtenir de l'aide pour une affaire de la plus haute importance. Étant donné la façon dont vous avez su vaincre Shiva, vous me paraissez être <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> plus apte pour cette mission.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000050_MOENBRYDA<tab>You see now why I had Tataru summon you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000050_MOENBRYDA<tab>Tu comprends pourquoi j'ai demandé à Tataru de t'appeler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000060_MINFILIA<tab>Now that we are all assembled, perhaps you would be good enough to elaborate on the nature of the matter which brought you to us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000060_MINFILIA<tab>Vous voulez bien nous en dire un peu plus sur cette affaire urgente, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000070_LUCIA<tab>The Observatorium's astrologians have sounded the alarum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000070_LUCIA<tab>Les astrologues de l'Observatoire ont alerté le Saint-Siège en toute urgence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000080_LUCIA<tab>Last night, the dragon star burned with an intensity not seen in fifteen summers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000080_LUCIA<tab>La nuit dernière, l'étoile du dragon brillait d'une intensité qui n'a pas été constatée depuis quinze ans, selon eux. Cet astre du ciel septentrional est réputé annoncer les mauvais présages.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000090_LUCIA<tab>Not since the Dravanians engaged the Empire in the Battle of Silvertear Skies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000090_LUCIA<tab>La dernière fois que ce phénomène a été aperçu, c'était lorsque les Dravaniens se sont lancés dans la bataille contre Garlemald, à Pleurargent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000100_URIANGER<tab>“The northern sky doth burn full bright upon the wyrm lord's call. The red behemoth beckoneth, and flame consumeth all.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000100_URIANGER<tab>“Quand le ciel s'illuminera à l'appel du seigneur des dragons, le monstre de fer rouge apparaîtra et le monde connaîtra l'enfer des flammes.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000110_LUCIA<tab>The old Coerthan rhyme, aye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000110_LUCIA<tab>Une ancienne fable que se transmettaient ceux qui vivaient autrefois dans l'ouest du Coerthas. Je suis étonnée que vous la connaissiez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000120_LUCIA<tab>The brightening of the dragon star is said to accompany the roar of a great wyrm. The astrologians believe that it was Midgardsormr himself who cried out on this occasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000120_LUCIA<tab>La croyance veut que cette étoile réagisse au rugissement des plus grands dragons, et nous craignons que Midgardsormr ne soit à l'origine du changement observé la nuit dernière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000130_URIANGER<tab>After an absence of centuries, the king of kings did return to lead his kind against the might of Garlemald...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000130_URIANGER<tab>Après des siècles d'absence, ce seigneur parmi les seigneurs était revenu pour guider son peuple contre l'Empire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000140_URIANGER<tab>...Only to fall in his duel with the <var 1A 02 /var>Agrius<var 1A 01 /var>, proud flagship of the Garlean fleet. Devoid of life, his corpse remaineth entwined about the magitek monstrosity even unto this day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000140_URIANGER<tab>Mais il est tombé lors de son af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment avec l'Agrius, le gigantesque aéronef des Garlemaldais. Désormais, seule demeure sa carcasse sans vie, enserrée autour de la monstrueuse épave magitek.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000150_MINFILIA<tab>Urianger has the right of it. Whatever this alteration in the dragon star portends, the great wyrm has shown no sign of life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000150_MINFILIA<tab>En effet, malgré les appréhensions d'Ishgard, Midgardsormr n'a pas montré le moindre signe de vie ces quinze dernières années.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000160_MINFILIA<tab>Tataru, have the Domans reported aught out of the ordinary?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000160_MINFILIA<tab>Tataru, les Domiens ont-ils signalé quoi que ce soit d'anormal récemment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000170_MOENBRYDA<tab>Correct me if I'm wrong, but if Midgardsormr had roared, wouldn't we have heard it here in Revenant's Toll?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000170_MOENBRYDA<tab>Si cet ancien dragon a vraiment rugi, pourquoi on ne l'a pas entendu au Glas des revenants<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000180_LUCIA<tab>“Roar” is but a figure of speech. Dravanians can communicate in ways beyond our ken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000180_LUCIA<tab>Le terme de “rugissement” est à vrai dire un abus de langage. La manière de communiquer des Dravaniens dépasse notre perception et notre entendement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000190_LUCIA<tab>It is for this very reason that we are forced to look for signs in the heavens. We cannot say with any confidence that a great wyrm roared at all, much less that it was Midgardsormr.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000190_LUCIA<tab>Pour cette raison, il nous est difficile d'affirmer qu'il y a eu un tel appel, et encore moins qu'il provient de Midgardsormr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000200_LUCIA<tab>Only by directly examining the Keeper of the Lake can we be certain. However, it will take too long to gain the Holy See's approval to dispatch the Temple Knights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000200_LUCIA<tab>Le seul moyen d'être sûrs, c'est d'aller enquêter au Gardien du lac. Cependant, obtenir l'au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion de l'Archevêque pour envoyer les templiers hors d'Ishgard prendrait beaucoup trop de temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000210_LUCIA<tab>Therefore, Ser Aymeric would entrust this task to you. Do you accept?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000210_LUCIA<tab>Pour cette raison, et eu égard à vos compétences, messire Aymeric aimerait vous confier cette tâche. Acceptez-vous de nous aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000220_LUCIA<tab>We knew you would not disappoint us. Now, if you would excuse me, I must return and assist the lord commander. We have precious little time to prepare.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000220_LUCIA<tab>Nous savions que nous pouvions compter sur vous.
Bien, veuillez m'excuser, mais je dois retourner au plus vite à Ishgard et assister le capitaine général dans nos pré<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000230_MINFILIA<tab>To prepare for what, pray tell?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000230_MINFILIA<tab>Vos pré<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tions...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000240_LUCIA<tab>When a great wyrm roars, his brethren cannot choose but answer. We prepare for battle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_000240_LUCIA<tab>Lorsqu'un grand dragon rugit, ses semblables doivent répondre à l'appel. Si les Dravaniens se mettent en marche, alors nous devons être prêts à les combattre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_100010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Who treadeth now upon my bones and waketh me from slumber sweet?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_100010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Qui ose pénétrer dans mon antre et troubler mon sommeil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_100020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou hast forgotten the face of thy lord. Remember, mortal, and fear me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_100020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tremble, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Tu vas apprendre ce qu'il en coûte de défier Midgardsormr, le seigneur des dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>By Her gifts hast thou earned a moment's reprieve.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu ne dois ton salut qu'au pouvoir de l'Écho, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>... Je t'offre donc un répit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Speak, mortal, and I shall listen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Je t'écoute. Dis-moi ce que tu recherches ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Guided by a <var 1A 02 /var>star<var 1A 01 /var>...? Heh heh heh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Certes, la lueur de cette étoile est un signe, un appel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>My people have heard the song. Ishgard shall burn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Mon peuple a entendu le chant. Ishgard sera réduite en cendres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Sons must answer for their fathers' misdeeds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Les fils paieront pour les crimes de leurs pères.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>We do not forget. We do not forgive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nous n'avons pas oublié. Nous ne pardonnerons jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Seven children did I sire. One now singeth of retribution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>J'ai engendré sept descendants, et c'est l'un d'eux qui appelle à la vengeance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200080_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I rise to join in the chorus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200080_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Il m'a réveillé de ce long sommeil, et je vais me joindre au chœur des miens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou art powerless to silence us, mortal. Yet thou shalt not live to labor in vain. Thy reprieve is at an end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu ne peux nous arrêter, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>.
C'en est assez de bavardages. Ta dernière heure est venue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200100_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Hmph. Trickery is thy shield. This frail, ignoble creature is not gifted, but chosen...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200100_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Mais quelle est cette ruse<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Cette lumière<var 1D /var>!
Cet être veule et vulgaire a donc été choisi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Hearken to me, Hydaelyn! I remember...and I <var 1A 02 /var>consent<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Écoute-moi, Hydaelyn... Si c'est là Ta volonté, je l'accepte...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Fear not, mortal... I shall not harm thee...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu ne périras pas aujourd'hui, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Heh heh heh. Mayhap thou thinkest me an oathbreaker?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>J'ai autrefois conclu un pacte avec Hydaelyn, et je tiendrai parole.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou art mistaken. If thou comest to harm, it shall be by another's hand, not mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Oui, tu mourras de la main d'un autre, pas de la mienne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I did but strip thee of thy mistress's feeble blessing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Sa lumière évanescente est désormais scellée par ma marque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou didst profit much by Her grace, but no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu as longtemps joui de Sa grâce, mais ça n'arrivera plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200170_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The covenant binds me to thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200170_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nous sommes désormais liés l'un à l'autre, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I shall watch...listen...and <var 1A 02 /var>wait<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tes yeux deviendront les miens, j'écouterai avec tes oreilles... et j'attendrai.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Fight and struggle, if it be thy will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>À toi d'agir et de briser de tes propres forces la marque que j'ai posée sur toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Man hath ever coveted that which lieth beyond his grasp.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Les Hommes ont toujours désiré ce qu'ils ne peuvent obtenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200210_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I drink of Her body, and thence doth mine own find new life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200210_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Je bois l'éther de Son corps, et grâce à Elle, mon être se régénère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200220_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>When it hath grown whole, the loyal and penitent shall rejoice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200220_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Lorsqu'il aura repris tout son pouvoir, alors l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> pénitent<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> se réjouira.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200230_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The Dragonsong heraldeth a beginning...and an end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_200230_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Le chant des dragons annonce un commencement... et une fin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300010_LUCIA<tab>My friend! I can scarce believe it! You confronted the wyrm lord and lived to tell the tale!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300010_LUCIA<tab>J'ai peine à le croire<var 1D /var>! Vous avez affronté Midgardsormr et survécu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300020_LUCIA<tab>I give thanks to Halone for your preservation. It is our sole cause for gladness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300020_LUCIA<tab>Toutefois, malgré votre victoire, il est encore trop tôt pour nous réjouir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300030_LUCIA<tab>Your encounter with the Keeper of the Lake served to confirm our fears. A great wyrm has roared, and it makes little difference if it was one of the two in Eorzea or any other...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300030_LUCIA<tab>Un grand dragon a émis son rugissement, et cela ne change rien que ce soit un des deux qui vivent en Éorzéa ou un autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300040_LUCIA<tab>The Dravanians are coming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300040_LUCIA<tab>Les Dravaniens vont répondre à l'appel et attaquer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300050_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am told that Ishgard has magical defenses against Dravanian attack, though I am not privy to their exact nature.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300050_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai cru comprendre qu'Ishgard dispose de défenses magiques contre les dragons, mais je dois admettre ne pas en connaître le détail.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Will they be enough to repel a massive force?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Suffiront-elles à repousser une attaque massive<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300070_LUCIA<tab>Ishgard has weathered countless assaults over centuries. This will be no different.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300070_LUCIA<tab>Ishgard a résisté à de nombreux assauts au cours des siècles. Cette fois encore, nous tiendrons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300080_LUCIA<tab>And now that you have confirmed the threat, none can ignore the lord commander's calls for the wards to be strengthened.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300080_LUCIA<tab>Maintenant que la menace est confirmée, personne ne pourra ignorer l'appel du capitaine général à renforcer les gardes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300090_LUCIA<tab>I dare not presume to speak for him, but I expect the lord commander would sing your praises.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300090_LUCIA<tab>Je ne peux pas parler en son nom, mais je suis sûre que messire Aymeric fera vos louanges en apprenant votre exploit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300100_LUCIA<tab>I must away, but we shall meet again soon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300100_LUCIA<tab>Je dois partir maintenant, mais je ne doute pas que nous nous reverrons bientôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Countless assaults weathered...and this will be no different? Why am I not convinced?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_300110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Combien de temps encore cette guerre qui oppose les Ishgardais aux dragons doit-elle durer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400010_MOENBRYDA<tab>Now that everything's calmed down a bit─relatively speaking, I mean─I thought it might be a good time to share our progress on the weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400010_MOENBRYDA<tab>La question de Midgardsormr étant plus ou moins réglée, je crois que nous pouvons maintenant vous faire part de nos progrès sur la création de l'arme anti-Asciens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400020_MOENBRYDA<tab>I believe we're on the verge of a breakthrough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400020_MOENBRYDA<tab>Je pense que nous ne sommes plus très loin du but.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400030_MINFILIA<tab>Well, don't keep us all in suspense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400030_MINFILIA<tab>Vous avez découvert quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400040_MOENBRYDA<tab>Just in case anyone's forgotten, let's start by reviewing what we already know. So! An Ascian is an immortal because its soul doesn't return to the aetherial realm when its host is defeated. Instead, it flees to the place that lies between our world and the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400040_MOENBRYDA<tab>Peut-être. Mais avant d'entrer dans les détails, je vous propose de commencer par revoir ce que nous savons déjà. Les Asciens sont immortels parce que leurs âmes ne retournent pas dans le royaume éthéréen après la mort. Au lieu de ça, elles se cachent dans un interstice entre les deux mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400050_MOENBRYDA<tab>Therefore, the first step to <var 1A 02 /var>permanently<var 1A 01 /var> defeating an Ascian is preventing its soul from making this journey. And if you recall, when we last gathered here, I had verified that white auracite has adequate capacity to entrap the beings, albeit only briefly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400050_MOENBRYDA<tab>La première étape pour vaincre un agent du chaos est donc d'empêcher son âme de faire ce voyage. La dernière fois que nous nous sommes réunis, j'ai pu constater que l'auralithe avait les facultés requises pour piéger ces êtres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400060_THANCRED<tab>Which left the small matter of their extermination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400060_THANCRED<tab>Maintenant, il faut que nous trouvions un moyen de les anéantir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400070_URIANGER<tab>Aye. To unmake an Ascian soul, one must needs smite it with a concentrated burst, or “blade,” of purest aether. However, we wanted for both the data and the means to forge such a weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400070_URIANGER<tab>Pour détruire une âme d'Ascien, nous devons la frapper avec un éclat concentré d'éther pur, ce que plusieurs d'entre vous appellent une lame éthérée. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il nous manque le savoir et les moyens de créer une telle arme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400080_MOENBRYDA<tab>Short of experimenting on an actual Ascian, you see, there's no way to gauge how much aether its soul is made of.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400080_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ne pouvant effectuer des essais sur des agents du chaos, nous n'avons aucun moyen de jauger la quantité d'éther que contiennent leurs âmes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400090_MOENBRYDA<tab>As such, we don't know what aetheric density our blade needs to have in order for it to work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400090_MOENBRYDA<tab>De ce fait, nous ignorons quelle densité notre lame doit avoir pour fonctionner comme voulu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400100_YDA<tab>So we'll just have to make the densest blade we can, and hope for the best! Though that would require a <var 1A 02 /var>lot<var 1A 01 /var> of aether...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400100_YDA<tab>Dans ce cas, nous n'avons qu'à fabriquer une lame si dense qu'elle découpera n'importe quelle âme en petits morceaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400110_YDA<tab>Hang on a minute! Why didn't we think of this before!? White auracite can hold an absolute <var 1A 02 /var>heap<var 1A 01 /var> of aether, can't it!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400110_YDA<tab>Et pour être sûrs d'avoir tout l'éther nécessaire, nous n'avons qu'à remplir une autre auralithe à l'avance<var 1D /var>! Et hop, le tour est joué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400120_PAPALYMO<tab>Please tell me you're joking. Gods' sakes, Yda! I feel as though I'm reliving the same scene over and over with you! How many times do you need to be told that white auracite cannot store aether for long periods?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400120_PAPALYMO<tab>Yda... N'as-tu donc pas écouté les ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions de Moenbryda, l'autre fois<var 1D /var>? Combien de fois doit-on te répéter que cette pierre ne peut pas conserver l'éther indéfiniment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400130_PAPALYMO<tab>Being intangible matter, aether is given to dispersion; only in its crystallized form is it a stable source of energy. I will test you later on this, so see to it you do not forget.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400130_PAPALYMO<tab>Étant intangible par nature, cette énergie est instable et se disperse facilement, sauf lorsqu'elle s'est cristallisée. Compte sur moi pour t'interroger plus tard afin de m'assurer que tu n'as pas oublié.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400140_YDA<tab>Ah...r-right, yes... It's all coming back to me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400140_YDA<tab>Ah, d'accord<var 1D /var>! C'est donc comme ça que ça marche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400150_THANCRED<tab>So our hopes rest on good old crystals again, do they? While they are certainly reliable, they leave something to be desired in the area of portability.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400150_THANCRED<tab>Donc, ça nous ramène à ces bons vieux cristaux... Ils sont fiables en effet, mais ils ne sont pas vraiment commodes pour ce qui est du transport.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400160_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. I am reminded of the quantity of corrupted crystals required to thwart Leviathan, and the extraordinary lengths to which the Lominsans went to transport them. What if it should prove that a similar quantity was needed to destroy an Ascian soul─or still <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var>...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400160_YSHTOLA<tab>En effet. Les cristaux corrompus chargés dans le catamaran avaient tout juste suffi à bloquer les attaques de Léviathan. Notre objectif étant de détruire une âme d'Ascien, je crains que nous en ayons besoin d'une plus grande quantité cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400170_THANCRED<tab>I do not envy the poor sod who has to lug all of that around on the off chance that an Ascian appears.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400170_THANCRED<tab>Je plains le pauvre gars qui devra se trimballer avec tout ça en attendant qu'un agent du chaos veuille bien se montrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400180_MOENBRYDA<tab>That's the very problem we set out to solve, and I reckon we've found the answer. If it isn't practical to lug around the aether we need, we'll just have to draw upon another source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400180_MOENBRYDA<tab>C'est exactement le problème que nous cherchons à résoudre, et je crois bien que nous avons trouvé la solution. Plutôt que de transporter l'éther nécessaire, nous allons le puiser quelque part.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400190_MOENBRYDA<tab>And the only viable source is the land.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400190_MOENBRYDA<tab>Et la seule source utilisable, c'est le sol.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400200_YSHTOLA<tab>If you mean to tap the great river of aether, know that it will entail considerable risk. Meddling with the currents may well induce a surge like to the one which despoiled Mor Dhona.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400200_YSHTOLA<tab>Si tu parles de drainer les grands courants éthérés souterrains, sache que cela induit des risques considérables. Interagir avec toute cette énergie pourrait bien causer des jaillissements comme celui qui a bouleversé le paysage du Mor Dhona.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400210_MOENBRYDA<tab>Give me a bit more credit, will you? Why would we need to tap the river when there're veritable <var 1A 02 /var>reservoirs<var 1A 01 /var> jutting out all over the land?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400210_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, Y'shtola, j'ai une bien meilleure idée. Pourquoi irions-nous puiser sous le sol alors qu'il y a de véritables réservoirs à la surface, un peu partout<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400220_MOENBRYDA<tab>Aye, I speak of corrupted crystals. It might be that their aspect is out of balance, but a crystal's a crystal─it contains aether, and we can help ourselves to it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400220_MOENBRYDA<tab>Je veux bien sûr parler des cristaux corrompus. Ils ont beau avoir perdu leur équilibre élémentaire, ils n'en restent pas moins une formidable source d'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400230_THANCRED<tab>While corrupted crystals are indeed abundant, there is no guarantee that they will be in close proximity at a crucial moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400230_THANCRED<tab>Il est vrai qu'on en trouve beaucoup, mais rien ne nous garantit qu'il y en aura à proximité lorsque ce sera nécessaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400240_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ah, but what if we don't need them to be? What if we could tap their power from <var 1A 02 /var>afar<var 1A 01 /var>? A malm away, say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400240_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ah, mais qui dit que nous aurons besoin d'être à côté de ces cristaux<var 1D /var>? Et si nous pouvions utiliser leur énergie à distance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400250_MOENBRYDA<tab>If we could do that, we'd have ready access to aether aplenty in almost every corner of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400250_MOENBRYDA<tab>Nous aurions alors accès à d'immenses quantités d'éther où que nous soyons en Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400260_MOENBRYDA<tab>I've yet to put my theories to the proof, but I've got a good feeling about this. If no one has any objections, I'd like to see where this avenue leads.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400260_MOENBRYDA<tab>Je n'ai pas encore mis ma théorie à l'épreuve, mais j'ai de bonnes raisons d'y croire. S'il n'y a aucune objection, je vais pousser mes recherches dans cette direction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400270_MINFILIA<tab>If you think it worth your while, you have my blessing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400270_MINFILIA<tab>Si vous pensez que cela en vaut la peine, vous avez mon assentiment, Moenbryda.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400280_MINFILIA<tab>But tell us, what <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> your theories? I for one am most eager to understand the process, however vaguely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400280_MINFILIA<tab>J'aimerais juste savoir plus précisément en quoi consiste cette théorie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400290_MOENBRYDA<tab>I thought you might say that. But no one wants to listen to boring old theories all day, do they? I know I don't. So, with your permission, I'd like to try something a bit more hands-on. I've already built an aetheric siphon especially for this purpose, and I've been meaning to try it out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400290_MOENBRYDA<tab>À vrai dire, toutes ces ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions m'épuisent. Je préfère plutôt passer à la pratique. Il se trouve que j'ai déjà fabriqué un extracteur d'éther spé<var 16 /var>cia<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment pour ça, et j'ai bien l'intention de l'essayer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400300_MOENBRYDA<tab>Thing is, the profusion of corrupted crystals in Mor Dhona makes it something of a high-risk testing ground. If anything goes awry with the siphon, it would be better if it didn't happen within spitting distance of quite so much aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400300_MOENBRYDA<tab>Le problème, c'est qu'il y a beaucoup trop de cristaux corrompus au Mor Dhona. J'ai bien peur que la moindre erreur de calcul ne cause une réaction en chaîne in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>trô<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400310_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ideally, I need an isolated specimen. Does anyone know where I can find one?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400310_MOENBRYDA<tab>Il me faudrait plutôt des échan<var 16 /var>til<var 16 /var>lons isolés. Est-ce que l'un d'entre vous sait où je pourrais en trouver<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400320_ALPHINAUD<tab>May I suggest northern Thanalan? There you will find corrupted crystals of middling size, standing a reasonable distance apart. Ideal for your needs, I should have thought. Oh, and if you do elect to visit the place, I should be much obliged if you would assist me in another matter while you are in the area.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que diriez-vous du Thanalan septentrional<var 1D /var>? Les cristaux corrompus qui se trouvent là-bas sont de taille moyenne et suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment séparés les uns des autres. Si vous pensez qu'ils conviendront à vos expériences, j'aimerais vous demander de l'aide pour autre chose pendant que vous serez là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400330_MINFILIA<tab>Has something happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400330_MINFILIA<tab>Il y a un problème, Alphinaud<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Movement has been observed at Castrum Meridianum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Des mouvements ont été observés à Castrum Meridianum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400350_ALPHINAUD<tab>During Operation Archon, the Alliance dealt the stronghold a heavy blow. Its facilities were extensively damaged, and its garrison reduced to a fraction of its former strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lors de la contre-offensive “la marche des Preux”, cette forteresse impériale a été grandement endommagée et sa garnison réduite à une fraction de ce qu'elle était.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Not long after our forces withdrew, however, their ranks were replenished by reinforcements from Castrum Centri. They now seek to rebuild, and to this end they have their sights set upon the Ceruleum Processing Plant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Toutefois, après le retrait des forces alliées, des renforts ont été envoyés depuis Castrum Centri. Ils cherchent désormais à rebâtir, et pour ça, ils comptent s'attaquer à l'usine de céruleum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Having lost the Empire's support, the XIVth Legion lacks the resources to sustain itself. To them, this is a bid for survival, and they will doubtless fight like desperate men.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400370_ALPHINAUD<tab>La 14e légion a perdu le soutien de l'Empire et elle manque cruellement de ressources. Pour ces soldats, c'est une question de vie ou de mort, et ils se battront sans doute jusqu'au bout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though I have dispatched the Crystal Braves, I fear their strength alone may not suffice to stay the imperial assault. I would request the Scions' aid in the defensive effort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400380_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai envoyé les Braves du Cristal sur place, mais je crains qu'ils ne suffisent pas à contenir une attaque des Impériaux. J'aimerais avoir l'appui des Héritiers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400390_MOENBRYDA<tab>If I didn't know better, I'd say you were trying to inveigle us into fighting your battle with the promise of shiny crystals!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400390_MOENBRYDA<tab>Vous n'essayeriez pas un peu de nous manipuler, par hasard<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400400_MOENBRYDA<tab>Well then, consider me inveigled! I won't lie, the crystals you speak of sound perfect─so the Garleans have to go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400400_MOENBRYDA<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, moi, ça me convient par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>! Les cristaux dont vous m'avez parlé me semblent parfaits, et ces maudits Garlemaldais nous gênent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400410_MOENBRYDA<tab>Besides, we can't afford to beat about the bush. There's no telling when the Ascians will next appear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400410_MOENBRYDA<tab>Et puis, nous ne savons pas quand les Asciens se montreront de nouveau, alors autant ne pas perdre de temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400420_URIANGER<tab>Thine eagerness to hurl thyself into the jaws of danger cometh as little surprise. Exercise due caution, I prithee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400420_URIANGER<tab>Le danger semble exercer une étrange fascination sur toi, mon amie, mais je te prie d'être on ne peut plus prudente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400430_MINFILIA<tab>Though you have become a Crystal Brave, you are yet a Scion, Alphinaud. We could hardly refuse you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400430_MINFILIA<tab>Je soutiens l'opinion de Moenbryda. Tu peux compter sur les Héritiers, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400440_MINFILIA<tab>Pray join the Crystal Braves and lend them your support. Thancred and Papalymo shall accompany you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400440_MINFILIA<tab>Je te prie de bien vouloir apporter ton aide aux Braves du Cristal. Thancred et Papalymo vont t'accompagner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400450_MINFILIA<tab>Yda and Y'shtola─in the meantime I would have you assist Moenbryda. Scout out the crystal clusters, that the testing may commence as soon as the Garlean threat has been eliminated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400450_MINFILIA<tab>Yda et Y'shtola, j'aimerais que vous assistiez Moenbryda de votre côté. Inspectez les cristaux corrompus, de manière à ce que les essais puissent commencer dès que la menace garlemaldaise aura été neutralisée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400460_URIANGER<tab>If it please you, I shall continue mine own experiments on white auracite.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400460_URIANGER<tab>Si vous le permettez, je vais continuer mes expériences sur l'auralithe, de mon côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400470_MINFILIA<tab>Thank you, Urianger. Everyone, pray see to your preparations and depart as soon as you are able. Go well, and be safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_400470_MINFILIA<tab>Merci, Urianger. Veuillez tous vous préparer et partir dès que vous le pourrez. Faites bien attention à vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500010_MOENBRYDA<tab>Hold on. I won't be a second.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500010_MOENBRYDA<tab>Donne-moi juste un instant et je suis à toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500020_MOENBRYDA<tab>The beast seemed peckish, so I gave it a taste of my axe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500020_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ah, cet empêcheur de tourner en rond voulait me croquer. À la place, je lui ai fait goûter à ma hache.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500030_MOENBRYDA<tab>I know, I know... As Urianger never tires of reminding me, “An axe ill becometh the hand of a scholar.” What can I say? I like axes. To hear my mother tell it, I came into this world holding one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500030_MOENBRYDA<tab>Oui, je sais, je sais. Urianger dirait<var 1D /var>: “ce n'est pas digne d'une érudite”. Mais c'est plus fort que moi. Je suis une impulsive<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500040_MOENBRYDA<tab>And it's not as if it stopped me picking up a quill, is it? I often think of the man who introduced me to the joys of learning... He's one of the reasons I decided to come to Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500040_MOENBRYDA<tab>Mon maître a pourtant su m'inculquer la joie des études. C'est en partie pour lui que j'ai décidé de venir en Éorzéa... et aussi pour cet ami d'enfance in<var 16 /var>sup<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>ble que tu connais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500050_MOENBRYDA<tab>...Him and my excruciatingly stiff childhood friend. Considering how unalike we are, it's a wonder we ever got on. The world's a strange old place, isn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500050_MOENBRYDA<tab>Quand je pense à toutes nos différences, c'est un miracle que nous ayons réussi à aussi bien nous entendre. Ce monde est bien étrange, tu ne trouves pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500060_MOENBRYDA<tab>Aye, that ought to do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500060_MOENBRYDA<tab>Voilà qui devrait faire l'affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500070_MOENBRYDA<tab>So far, so good. At these concentrations, it shouldn't matter too much if something goes awry. Just enough aether to make it interesting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500070_MOENBRYDA<tab>Normalement, cette expérience n'entraînera pas de changements irrémédiables ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500080_MOENBRYDA<tab>Did you see that? The way the crystal glowed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500080_MOENBRYDA<tab>L'extracteur d'éther marche comme je l'espérais. Avec quelques petits réglages, il devrait nous fournir toute l'énergie nécessaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500090_MOENBRYDA<tab>The siphon works, I'm happy to say. With a few refinements, it should satisfy our appetite for aether. Which just leaves the small matter of forging our blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500090_MOENBRYDA<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'à trouver un moyen de forger notre lame éthérée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500100_MOENBRYDA<tab>I'm not sure how to go about it just yet, but I swear to find a way. I'll put a blade in your hands if it's the last thing I do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500100_MOENBRYDA<tab>Je ne sais pas encore comment procéder, mais tu peux compter sur moi pour trouver une solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500110_NABRIALES<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> senses me. A useful talent.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500110_NABRIALES<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> est donc capable de ressentir ma présence. Voilà qui est intéressant...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500120_MOENBRYDA<tab>An Ascian!? Are they onto us!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500120_MOENBRYDA<tab>Un Ascien<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Qu'est-ce qu'il fait là<var 1D /var>? Il est venu pour nous arrêter<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500130_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>By your brand, I see you are an Archon of Sharlayan. Keeper of knowledge. Seeker of truth. Meddler.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500130_NABRIALES<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Je reconnais là la marque des sages de Sharlayan, les gardiens du savoir... et fouineurs gênants.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500140_MOENBRYDA<tab>I don't know what the hells you're saying, but I don't much like your tone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500140_MOENBRYDA<tab>Je ne comprends pas ce qu'il dit, mais ça n'a pas l'air d'être des compliments.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500150_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hahaha. Your instincts serve you well. But come, be not unsettled on my account. That lovely brow was not made for frowns. Ah, but I waste my breath.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500150_NABRIALES<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Ha ha ha... Quelle formidable capacité de déduction. Mais il est inutile de faire cette grimace qui nuit à ce joli visage.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500160_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let me direct my words to one who understands them. We meet at last, Warrior of Light. I am Nabriales...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500160_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Protégé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la Lumière, tu comprends mon langage, toi. Je suis Nabriales des Asciens.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500170_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...And you have long been a thorn in my side. I suffered the overweening presence of Lahabrea that men might host the power of gods, only for you to undo my hard work.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500170_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu ne peux pas imaginer le tort que tu m'as fait... J'ai dû subir la présence de ce maudit Lahabrea pour permettre à une humaine de devenir le vaisseau d'un dieu, et tout ça pour finalement te voir défaire mon œuvre.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500180_MOENBRYDA<tab>Yaaarrrgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500180_MOENBRYDA<tab>Aaaaahhhh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500190_MOENBRYDA<tab>Oh, bugger...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500190_MOENBRYDA<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500200_MOENBRYDA<tab>Urgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500200_MOENBRYDA<tab>Aah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Do settle down.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Reste là où tu es.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500220_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You must concede that I acted in self-defense.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500220_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu dois reconnaître que je n'ai fait que me défendre.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500230_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But what's this? I do not sense the blessing of Light...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500230_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tiens, c'est étrange... Je ne ressens pas la bénédiction de la Lumière en toi...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500240_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Oh dear! Could it be that frail Hydaelyn has forgotten Her champion!? This I did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> foresee!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500240_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hé hé hé... Se pourrait-il que la frêle Hydaelyn ait fini par abandonner <var 08 E905 ((sa championne)) ((son champion)) /var><var 1D /var>? Voilà qui est inattendu<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500250_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Shorn of Light as you are, you are no longer a threat. And better yet, the seal is broken.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500250_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Sans sa protection, tu n'es plus vraiment une menace. Je devrais sans doute en profiter pour t'éliminer...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500260_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Now is the time to claim the staff!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500260_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>... Non, je crois que je vais plutôt aller récupérer le bâton dont Elidibus a parlé. Il va me permettre de me hisser au-dessus des autres.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500270_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>With it in my grasp, I shall rise above them all and take my place at Lord Zodiark's right hand!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500270_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>C'est moi qui obtiendrai les faveurs de Zordiarche<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500280_MOENBRYDA<tab>What did that bastard want with us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500280_MOENBRYDA<tab>Il a disparu<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que ce salaud nous voulait au juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500290_MOENBRYDA<tab>Nabriales, he calls himself? With charm like that, I'll bet he has maidens falling at his feet. Unconscious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500290_MOENBRYDA<tab>Hmpf, j'imagine que ce Nabriales est doué pour “tomber” les femmes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500300_MOENBRYDA<tab>But this staff─you say just talking about it had the bastard grinning like a brat on his nameday? Must be quite a staff.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500300_MOENBRYDA<tab>Et tu me dis qu'il est parti sou<var 16 /var>dai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pour récupérer un bâton<var 1D /var>? Pour que les Asciens puissent le désirer, j'imagine que ce n'est pas un vulgaire bout de bois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500310_MOENBRYDA<tab>Oh, gods... He means Tupsimati, Master Louisoix's staff!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500310_MOENBRYDA<tab>Ah, je sais<var 1D /var>! C'est Tupsimati<var 1D /var>! Le bâton de maître Louisoix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500320_MOENBRYDA<tab>Minfilia's in danger! We have to get back to the Rising Stones!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_500320_MOENBRYDA<tab>Minfilia est en danger<var 1D /var>! Nous devons retourner au Refuge des roches<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600010_MINFILIA<tab>You two!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600010_MINFILIA<tab>Vous deux<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600020_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So you were able to divine my intent. What now, Warrior of Light? Ah, but that name is no longer fitting. You have become decidedly <var 1A 02 /var>dull<var 1A 01 /var>, and quite incapable of barring my entry.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600020_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu as donc réussi à deviner mes intentions. Mais que vas-tu faire maintenant, Protégé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la Lumière... ou plutôt Abandonné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la Lumière<var 1D /var>? Tu es désormais impuissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> contre moi.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600030_MINFILIA<tab>What do you mean!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600030_MINFILIA<tab>Comment ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600040_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You truly do not know? Then I suppose it is only right that I <var 1A 02 /var>enlighten<var 1A 01 /var> you.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600040_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ne me dis pas que tu l'ignorais<var 1D /var>? Hé hé hé...<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600050_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The blessing of Light kept you and your fellow meddlers safe. It was that which prevented my kind from entering your domain.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600050_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>La bénédiction du Cristal vous a longtemps protégés, toi et ta bande de fouineurs, mais c'est fini maintenant.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600060_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>My kind, I say, though it had no power over the likes of Elidibus and Lahabrea. Being of this world, they could come and go as they please, while I could only look on...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600060_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>À vrai dire, cela n'avait aucun effet sur ceux comme Elidibus et Lahabrea. Appartenant à ce monde, ils pouvaient aller et venir comme bon leur semblait, alors que moi, je ne pouvais que les regarder faire.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600070_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But I need look no longer. Now that the seal is gone, I mean to act. Unlike the others, I am not given to waiting. I shall take that staff and bring about the next Rejoining.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600070_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Mais tout cela est révolu. Maintenant que le sceau a été levé, je ne compte pas perdre de temps. Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment aux autres, la patience n'a jamais été une de mes qualités. Je vais prendre le bâton et déclencher la prochaine Réunion.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600080_MINFILIA<tab>...Rejoining? Then it was <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> doing! The Isle of Val, the scholars─all of it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600080_MINFILIA<tab>La Réunion...<var 1D /var>!? Nos soupçons étaient donc fondés<var 1D /var>! Vous et les vôtres êtes bien à l'origine de la disparition de l'île de Val<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600090_MOENBRYDA<tab>You will not harm her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600090_MOENBRYDA<tab>Rah, j'en ai ma claque de ce charabia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600100_MOENBRYDA<tab>Urrrgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600100_MOENBRYDA<tab>AAaahh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600110_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600110_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600120_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Why must you insist on forcing my hand? Did you learn nothing from our last meeting? Ah, but I forget─my words fall upon deaf ears.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600120_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Pourquoi m'obliges-tu à utiliser la force comme ça<var 1D /var>? Ça ne t'a pas suffi, tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>? Ah, mais j'oubliais, tu ne comprends pas ce que je dis...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600130_MINFILIA<tab>The staff is but a broken relic─a memorial to the departed. What possible use could you have for it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600130_MINFILIA<tab>Pourquoi désirez-vous ce bâton<var 1D /var>? Ce n'est qu'une relique, le souvenir d'un défunt. Que pourrait-il bien vous apporter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600140_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What use!? You mean to say that all this time, you kept the key, never knowing what it was you possessed?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600140_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ne me dis pas que tu l'as gardé tout ce temps sans savoir de quoi il s'agit.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600150_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The staff Tupsimati─or rather, the stone tablet it bears─is host to a great power.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600150_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ce bâton, ou plutôt la tablette qu'il renferme, recèle un grand pouvoir.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600160_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Together with the horn, it can be used to draw vast quantities of aether from its bearer's surroundings.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600160_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>En combinaison avec le cor à son extrémité, il permet de rassembler l'éther autour de soi en grande quantité.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600170_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>How else do you think Louisoix was able to invoke the power of the Twelve without making them an offering of crystals?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600170_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Comment crois-tu que Louisoix a réussi à invoquer le pouvoir des Douze sans cristaux<var 1D /var>?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600180_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Summoning requires not only prayer, but a profusion of aether. Even a child knows that.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600180_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Les prières ne suffisent pas si elles ne sont pas accompagnées d'une abondance d'éther. Même les enfants savent ça<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600190_MINFILIA<tab>If I did not know before, you may be certain I do now. But above all, I know that we cannot allow this staff to fall into your hands. I will die before I let you take it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600190_MINFILIA<tab>Eh bien, voilà un manque qui est désormais comblé. Et maintenant je sais que nous ne pouvons pas laisser ce bâton tomber entre vos mains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600200_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Insufferable woman. I would happily end your miserable life here and now... Alas, Elidibus would never let me hear the end of it.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600200_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Pauvre mortelle. Je me ferais un plaisir d'abréger ta misérable existence ici, mais Elidibus me le reprocherait durement.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Very well. If you will not part with the staff, I will take you too.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu vas donc m'accompagner.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600220_MOENBRYDA<tab>After them! Quickly...before the rift closes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_600220_MOENBRYDA<tab>Vite<var 1D /var>! Il faut les suivre... avant que la faille se referme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700010_NABRIALES<tab>It appears I have underestimated you... You are a formidable foe, even without the blessing of Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700010_NABRIALES<tab>On dirait bien que je t'ai sous-estimé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Tu restes un formidable adversaire, même sans le pouvoir de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700020_NABRIALES<tab>And now I am forced to reveal this unseemly form. Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700020_NABRIALES<tab>Et maintenant je dois révéler cette forme pathétique. Hmpf<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700030_MOENBRYDA<tab>You're safe... Thank the Twelve...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700030_MOENBRYDA<tab>Les Douze soient loués... Vous êtes vivant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700040_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You may have bested me this day...but what of the next? What of all the days to come!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700040_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu m'as peut-être vaincu cette fois, mais tu ne pourras pas garder ce précieux bâton indéfiniment.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700050_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Remember: Light no longer holds sway here. I may return whensoever I wish. Again and again and again. Eventually, you will falter and the staff will be mine. Until next time, Scions.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700050_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>La Lumière n'exerce plus aucun pouvoir ici. Je reviendrai encore et encore jusqu'à ce que cette relique soit mienne<var 1D /var>! À très bientôt, Héritiers de la Septième Aube...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700060_MINFILIA<tab>There will be no next time! This is the end!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700060_MINFILIA<tab>Il n'y aura pas de prochaine fois<var 1D /var>! Votre âme n'ira nulle part<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700070_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!? What trickery is this!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700070_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>M-mais qu'est-ce qui m'arrive<var 1D /var>!?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700080_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>No! Nooo! You cannot! Nooooooooo!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700080_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Non<var 1D /var>! Je vous défends de... Non<var 1D /var>! Noooooon<var 1D /var>!!!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700090_MINFILIA<tab>Use Tupsimati to gather aether! Quickly, before he breaks free!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700090_MINFILIA<tab>Vite<var 1D /var>! Utilise Tupsimati pour concentrer l'éther, avant qu'il n'arrive à se libérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700100_MINFILIA<tab>Concentrate! Call to mind the time you struck down Lahabrea with the blade of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700100_MINFILIA<tab>Concentre-toi<var 1D /var>! Rappelle-toi lorsque tu as vaincu Lahabrea avec cette lame de lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700110_MINFILIA<tab>Why won't it work? Is it because we lack the blessing of Light?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700110_MINFILIA<tab>Oh, non<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi ça marche pas<var 1D /var>!? Est-ce qu'Hydaelyn ne nous confère plus sa grâce<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700120_MOENBRYDA<tab>Damn it... So much aether...and it still isn't enough...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700120_MOENBRYDA<tab>Malédiction... Il n'y a pas assez d'éther...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700130_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Fools! No mortal prison can contain me! I shall make you pay for your insolence!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700130_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Imbéciles<var 1D /var>! Vos vulgaires artifices ne peuvent pas me retenir<var 1D /var>! Vous allez payer pour cette impertinence<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700140_MINFILIA<tab>Please, Mother Hydaelyn! Hearken to our plea! Lend us Your divine Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700140_MINFILIA<tab>Ô Hydaelyn, ô Cristal-mère, écoute ma prière<var 1D /var>! Je t'en supplie, donne-nous le pouvoir de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700150_MINFILIA<tab>Why can You not hear us? Do our words no longer reach You?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700150_MINFILIA<tab>Pourquoi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Pourquoi ne nous réponds-tu pas<var 1D /var>? Tu n'entends donc pas notre appel<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700160_MOENBRYDA<tab>If only we had...a bit more aether...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700160_MOENBRYDA<tab>Si seulement... nous avions un peu plus... d'éther...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700170_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda! What are you doing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700170_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que vous faites<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700180_MOENBRYDA<tab>Master Louisoix... I understand now...the choice you made...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700180_MOENBRYDA<tab>Maître Louisoix... Je comprends maintenant... le choix que vous avez fait...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700190_MOENBRYDA<tab>In death...there is life... Farewell, Urianger...you daft old coot...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700190_MOENBRYDA<tab>La mort... pour conserver la vie... Adieu, Urianger... vieux grincheux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700200_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda, no! You mustn't─!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700200_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda<var 1D /var>! Non<var 1D /var>! Ne faites pas ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!? Nooo! It...it cannot end!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700210_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Nooooon<var 1D /var>! Arrêêêêête<var 1D /var>! Je peux pas disparaître comme ça<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700220_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I am eternal! I am immortaaaaaal!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700220_NABRIALES<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Je suis immortel<var 1D /var>! Éterneeeeeeeel...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700230_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda... She's...she's gone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700230_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda... Elle... elle a disparu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700240_MINFILIA<tab>You did it, my friend. The Ascian is dead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_700240_MINFILIA<tab>Nous avons réussi. Cet Ascien n'existe plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800010_MINFILIA<tab>This device is a legacy of Moenbryda's toils and sacrifice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800010_MINFILIA<tab>Cet appareil est le fruit du labeur et du sacrifice de Moenbryda.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800020_MINFILIA<tab>I shall hold on to it for safekeeping.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800020_MINFILIA<tab>Je vais me charger de le garder pour le moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800030_YDA<tab>Minfilia! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800030_YDA<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800040_MINFILIA<tab>I am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800040_MINFILIA<tab>Mes amis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800050_PAPALYMO<tab>We were surveying northern Thanalan when we received the distress call.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800050_PAPALYMO<tab>Nous étions en train de prospecter dans le Thanalan septentrional lorsque nous avons reçu l'appel de détresse de Moenbryda.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800060_PAPALYMO<tab>We returned as swiftly as we were able.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800060_PAPALYMO<tab>Nous sommes revenus en toute hâte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800070_THANCRED<tab>It seems you have everything in hand, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800070_THANCRED<tab>On dirait cependant que vous vous êtes occupé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s du problème.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800080_YSHTOLA<tab>What happened here? Where is Moenbryda?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800080_YSHTOLA<tab>Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé au juste<var 1D /var>? Où est Moenbryda<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800090_THANCRED<tab>She gave her life to temper the blade of Light? I...I have no words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800090_THANCRED<tab>Elle a donné sa vie pour alimenter la lame d'éther et tuer un Ascien<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800100_YSHTOLA<tab>Rather than await the inevitable, she took her fate into her own hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800100_YSHTOLA<tab>Sans ce sacrifice de sa part, Dieux savent quel massacre nous aurions découvert en arrivant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800110_YDA<tab>Does...does Urianger know...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800110_YDA<tab>Est-ce qu'Urianger... est au courant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800120_MINFILIA<tab>My friend. There is something I must tell you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800120_MINFILIA<tab>Mon ami, j'ai quelque chose de grave à vous dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800130_URIANGER<tab>I heard all, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800130_URIANGER<tab>J'ai tout entendu, Minfilia.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800140_URIANGER<tab>The moon sinketh, taking her leave of the heavens. Yet her passing heraldeth the coming of a new day.
...Moenbryda hath fulfilled her destiny, hath she not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800140_URIANGER<tab>La lune décline à l'horizon, disparaissant des cieux. Son sillage, néanmoins, guide les premiers rayons de l'aube... Moenbryda a accompli sa destinée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800150_URIANGER<tab>Long ago, far across the seas in the Sharlayan motherland, Moenbryda and I did study under the sage tutelage of Master Louisoix.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800150_URIANGER<tab>Il y a bien longtemps, dans le lointain pays de Sharlayan, elle et moi avons étudié sous la tutelle du sage maître Louisoix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800160_URIANGER<tab>Full oft did he impress upon us that knowledge existeth to serve the greater good. This sentiment, however, was contrary to the nation's policy of neutrality, which censured intercedence in the affairs of foreign lands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800160_URIANGER<tab>Bien souvent nous a-t-il répété que le savoir existe pour servir l'intérêt commun. Cet idéal était toutefois contraire à la politique sharlayanaise de neutralité, qui interdisait d'interférer avec les affaires étrangères.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800170_URIANGER<tab>In spite of vehement opposition, he founded the Circle of Knowing and journeyed hither to the heart of Eorzea. Through his noble sacrifice was the realm spared its doom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800170_URIANGER<tab>Malgré la vive opposition qu'il a rencontrée, notre maître a fondé le Cénacle du Savoir et voyagé jusqu'ici, en Éorzéa. C'est son noble sacrifice qui a permis de sauver ces terres d'une destruction totale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800180_URIANGER<tab>Yet this great soul, whom all should rightly have honored, was branded a pariah in his own land. His peers did accuse him of forsaking his duty as a man of learning, and of meddling in the course of history.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800180_URIANGER<tab>Pourtant, loin d'être loué pour sa bravoure, il a été réprouvé dans sa patrie. Ses pairs l'ont accusé d'avoir trahi son devoir d'homme de science et ont blâmé la manière dont il est intervenu dans le cours de l'Histoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800190_URIANGER<tab>When he left Sharlayan behind, Master Louisoix gave no word to signal his intent to Moenbryda. Close as they were, as master and disciple, she was deeply wounded by the sudden exclusion from his confidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800190_URIANGER<tab>Lorsqu'il a quitté Sharlayan, maître Louisoix avait pris soin de cacher ses intentions à Moenbryda. Cet apparent manque de confiance l'avait très pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment blessée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800200_URIANGER<tab>Above all, however, she was confused. Try as she might, she could ill comprehend her master's motive. The slanders that were heaped upon him after his passing served only to inflame the turmoil within her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800200_URIANGER<tab>Elle est celle qui a eu le plus de mal à comprendre pourquoi il avait agi ainsi. Elle avait beau chercher, elle ne trouvait pas de réponse, et les critiques dont il faisait alors l'objet renforçaient encore plus cette confusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800210_URIANGER<tab>For years upon end, she knew not what to believe, torn as she was 'twixt the man whom she revered, and the man who forsook her and his duty both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800210_URIANGER<tab>Pendant bien longtemps, elle n'a pas su ce qu'elle devait croire. Elle était partagée entre son admiration pour son maître et l'appréhension envers l'homme qui l'avait mise à l'écart et renié son devoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800220_MINFILIA<tab>The Louisoix I knew would never forsake his duty, much less one of his own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800220_MINFILIA<tab>Louisoix n'aurait jamais abandonné ses res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés, et encore moins un de ses pairs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800230_URIANGER<tab>This I know full well, my lady. 'Twas not for want of love that Master Louisoix hid his intent. He but desired that Moenbryda discover her own path, free of the shadow of his influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800230_URIANGER<tab>Je le sais bien, Minfilia. Notre maître avait ses raisons de tenir Moenbryda à l'écart de ses projets. Il voulait qu'elle trouve sa voie par elle-même, sans être influencée par lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800240_URIANGER<tab>Long did I contemplate revealing the truth to her, and long did I hold my peace. After all, was it not Master Louisoix's wish that she come to the truth unaided? I told myself it was, and resolved to let her suffer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800240_URIANGER<tab>Je désirais franchement lui révéler la vérité, mais je craignais que mes mots ne rendent pas justice à la véritable volonté de notre maître. J'ai choisi de garder le silence... et je n'ai plus d'autre choix désormais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800250_URIANGER<tab>Knowingly did I deny my friend the comfort she craved. And now she hath gone to her rest with doubt still in her heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800250_URIANGER<tab>À cause de ma passivité, mon amie a quitté ce monde en gardant le doute dans son cœur. Et à cause de ça, je... je vais devoir porter le fardeau du regret jusqu'à mon dernier souffle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800260_URIANGER<tab>Speakest thou in earnest? Did Moenbryda truly come to understand Master Louisoix's will before the end?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800260_URIANGER<tab>Elle a vraiment dit ça<var 1D /var>? Moenbryda aurait donc compris maître Louisoix dans ses derniers instants<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800270_URIANGER<tab>The realization hath set her free. She may now find the peace which hath for so long eluded her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800270_URIANGER<tab>Cette prise de conscience l'a sûrement libérée. Elle aura réussi à trouver la paix qui lui avait échappé si longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800280_URIANGER<tab>Oh, Moenbryda... My dearest... How I shall miss thee...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800280_URIANGER<tab>Ma chère Moenbryda... Je ne t'oublierai jamais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800290_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda gave her life that we might possess the means to defeat the Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800290_MINFILIA<tab>Moenbryda a donné sa vie pour que nous ayons les moyens de vaincre les Asciens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800300_MINFILIA<tab>Her sacrifice must not be in vain. Let us continue her work on the blade of aether and see it to completion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800300_MINFILIA<tab>Son sacrifice ne doit pas être vain. Nous devons poursuivre et terminer son travail sur la lame d'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800310_URIANGER<tab>My lady. I would mourn Moenbryda in mine own way. I beg your permission to return to the Waking Sands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800310_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia, si vous le permettez, je vais rentrer au Refuge des sables. J'ai besoin de faire le deuil de mon amie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800320_MINFILIA<tab>Of course, my friend. Take all the time you require. We shall be here should you have need of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_800320_MINFILIA<tab>Je vous en prie, Urianger. Prenez tout le temps qu'il vous faudra. Nous serons toujours là, si vous avez besoin de nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900010_MINFILIA<tab>Forgive me, Moenbryda. Had I been quicker, or wiser...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900010_MINFILIA<tab>Pardonnez-moi, Moenbryda. Si seulement j'avais été plus vigilante, plus sage...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900020_MINFILIA<tab>But I was not, and you paid the price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900020_MINFILIA<tab>J'ai failli, et vous en avez payé le prix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900030_MINFILIA<tab>But you would not suffer us to wallow in our sorrow, would you? You would tell us to...pick ourselves up and get on with it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900030_MINFILIA<tab>Mais je suis sûre que vous ne supporteriez pas que nous nous apitoyions sur nous-mêmes. Non, vous nous exhorteriez à aller de l'avant, à continuer, et c'est ce que nous allons faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900040_MINFILIA<tab>And so we shall. We shall defend this realm and her people to the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900040_MINFILIA<tab>Nous, Héritiers de la Septième Aube, défendrons Éorzéa et ses habitants jusqu'au bout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Life for death. A fair exchange.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Donner sa vie pour une autre. Voilà qui est équitable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Other bargains will be struck.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>D'autres sacrifices comme celui-ci auront lieu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900050_YDA<tab>I'll never forget you, Moen. None of us will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900050_YDA<tab>Tu resteras à jamais dans nos cœurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900080_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The song riseth to a crescendo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900080_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>... Le chant de mes enfants va crescendo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900090_YDA<tab>Is that what I think it is...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900090_YDA<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hello!? Can you hear me!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Allô<var 1D /var>? Vous m'entendez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900110_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have received grave tidings from Ishgard. Pray return to the Rising Stones at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous avons reçu de graves nouvelles d'Ishgard. Vous et les autres devez retourner au Refuge des roches au plus vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900120_MINFILIA<tab>Twelve forfend, is the hour already upon us!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900120_MINFILIA<tab>Que les Douze nous protègent<var 1D /var>! Les Dravaniens ont déjà lancé l'assaut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900130_MINFILIA<tab>Come. Our enemies do not rest, and neither will we.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_900130_MINFILIA<tab>Il est de notre devoir d'unir Éorzéa contre nos ennemis<var 1D /var>! Rentrons sans attendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)The sons must answer for their fathers' misdeeds. Only then will the cycle be broken...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00010_ICEHEART<tab>Les fils doivent répondre des crimes de leurs pères. Ce n'est qu'ainsi que justice sera faite...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00020_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Brothers and sisters of the heavens! We raise our voices and join you in the chorus!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00020_ICEHEART<tab>Frères et sœurs des cieux<var 1D /var>! Entendez nos voix se joindre aux vôtres dans ce noble chant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)The sinners' feeble magicks are undone! Come! Claim your retribution!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00030_ICEHEART<tab>Les faibles sortilèges des pécheurs ont été rompus<var 1D /var>! Venez et assouvissez votre désir de vengeance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00040_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Ahahahahahah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_A00040_ICEHEART<tab>HA HA HA HA HA HA<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00010_MINFILIA<tab>Alphinaud, it is good to see you. Tell me, what have you learned?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00010_MINFILIA<tab>Quelque chose ne va pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pray summon the others. Everyone must hear my report.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Veux-tu bien appeler les autres, s'il te plaît, Minfilia<var 1D /var>? Je souhaite expliquer la situation à tout le monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00030_MINFILIA<tab>So this was all but a taste of what's to come...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00030_MINFILIA<tab>... Alors tout ceci n'est donc qu'un prélude à l'attaque que Nidhogg prépare.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. The main host advances upon Ishgard as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, c'est son rugissement qui a appelé l'armée qui avance sur Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00050_PAPALYMO<tab>Whose vaunted defenses have been nullified.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00050_PAPALYMO<tab>... Dont les défenses tant vantées ont été affaiblies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00060_YSHTOLA<tab>Shorn of its wards, the city will bear the full force of Nidhogg's fury.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00060_YSHTOLA<tab>Ce grand dragon et les siens ne feront pas de quartier dans leur assaut contre la sainte Cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00070_YDA<tab>All those people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00070_YDA<tab>Tous ces pauvres gens...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00080_THANCRED<tab>Alphinaud is right. The Dravanians cannot be allowed to prevail. If Ishgard falls, all of Eorzea will suffer the consequences.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00080_THANCRED<tab>Alphinaud a raison. Nous ne pouvons pas laisser les Dravaniens accomplir leurs desseins, autrement c'est tout Éorzéa qui en subira les con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then you agree that we have no choice but to intervene. For the good of the realm, the Scions of the Seventh Dawn and the Crystal Braves must join the defense of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous acceptez donc que les Héritiers de la Septième Aube et les Braves du Cristal participent à la défense d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00100_MINFILIA<tab>Let there be no ambiguity about what has been proposed. We would be directly intervening in the war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00100_MINFILIA<tab>Soyons clairs, en intervenant, nous prendrons position dans une guerre qui fait rage depuis des siècles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00110_MINFILIA<tab>But if all here believe the cause to be just, then to war we shall go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00110_MINFILIA<tab>Mais si tous ici pensent que cette cause est juste, alors nous apporterons notre soutien aux Ishgardais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00120_MINFILIA<tab>The path we now embark upon is perilous, but I pray you will walk with us to the end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00120_MINFILIA<tab>La voie dans laquelle nous nous engageons est périlleuse, et je te prie de bien vouloir nous accompagner jusqu'au bout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00130_MINFILIA<tab>For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00130_MINFILIA<tab>Merci. Nous nous battrons. Pour ceux que nous avons perdus, et ceux que nous pouvons encore sauver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then it is settled. I shall inform the council of our intentions, and request that they contribute their own forces to the defense of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_C00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est donc décidé. Je vais informer le comité de l'Alliance éorzéenne de nos intentions, et également leur demander de joindre leurs forces à la défense d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00010_MERLWYB<tab>We are well aware of Ishgard's dilemma, and we agree with your assessment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00010_MERLWYB<tab>Nous sommes bien au fait des problèmes d'Ishgard, et nous sommes d'accord avec ton analyse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then I trust there are no objections to the Crystal Braves' intervention?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, vous n'avez aucune objection à ce que les Braves du Cristal interviennent<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00030_RAUBAHN<tab>Ul'dah has none.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00030_RAUBAHN<tab>Aucune de la part d'Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00040_KANESENNA<tab>Gridania does not object.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00040_KANESENNA<tab>Gridania ne s'y oppose pas non plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00050_MERLWYB<tab>The Crystal Braves are yours to command, Alphinaud. Do what you will. We shall pray for your success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00050_MERLWYB<tab>Les Braves du Cristal sont sous ton commandement, Alphinaud. Fais comme bon te semble. Nous espérons que vous serez triomphants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>It was my hope that you would offer more substantial aid than prayer. I know it is within your means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>À vrai dire, j'espérais que vous nous offririez de l'aide en plus de vos accords. Je sais que vous en avez les moyens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00070_MERLWYB<tab>Do not presume that you have knowledge of our every concern. The Garleans and the beast tribes are but two of many.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00070_MERLWYB<tab>Je pense que tu surestimes ta con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de nos problèmes. Les Garlemaldais et les tribus barbares ne sont pas les seules menaces qui nous touchent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00080_MERLWYB<tab>We are not in a position to contribute greatly to the defense of Ishgard─not when our own homes are still under siege.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00080_MERLWYB<tab>Nous ne sommes pas en mesure d'apporter notre soutien à la protection d'Ishgard. Nous devons avant tout assurer la nôtre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00090_KANESENNA<tab>We dare not leave our interests in Carteneau undefended as well. Teledji Adeledji and his ilk would seize control of the territories in our absence.
