target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00090_KANESENNA<tab>Nous ne souhaitons pas non plus abandonner la défense de nos intérêts dans la plaine de Carteneau. Teledji Adeledji et les siens ne manqueraient pas l'opportunité d'en prendre le contrôle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>The enemy is at their gates, and you would cower behind yours!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais les Dravaniens sont prêts à attaquer Ishgard à tout moment. Ne me dites pas que vous préférez rester cachés derrière vos murs<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00110_RAUBAHN<tab>No one is cowering, boy. We will offer what support we can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00110_RAUBAHN<tab>Personne ne se cache, mon garçon. Nous fournirons toute l'aide que nous pourrons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00120_MERLWYB<tab>Aye. <var 1A 02 /var>Support<var 1A 01 /var>. A handful of men and no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00120_MERLWYB<tab>Oui, aide est le terme qui convient. Je peux dif<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment affecter plus que quelques unités.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00130_KANESENNA<tab>Would that we could commit more than a token force to this cause. Yet there <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> others to whom you might turn. The free companies ever want for work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00130_KANESENNA<tab>J'aimerais vraiment pouvoir faire plus pour cette cause. Mais sans doute que cela ne sera pas nécessaire. Il y a nombre de compagnies libres qui souhaitent se rendre utiles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00140_RAUBAHN<tab>Ah, yes, the free companies... They're not like to turn you down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00140_RAUBAHN<tab>Faire appel aux aventuriers... Oui, cela me semble être la solution idéale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>I beg your pardon!? You would entrust the survival of Ishgard to <var 1A 02 /var>sellswords<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je n'en crois pas mes oreilles<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes prêts à confier l'avenir d'Ishgard à des soldats indépendants<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Crises like these are the very reason why this alliance was formed! It is our duty to aid our fellow man!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les crises comme celle-ci sont la raison même pour laquelle l'Alliance a été créée<var 1D /var>! Il est de notre devoir d'aider nos semblables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00170_MERLWYB<tab>My <var 1A 02 /var>duty<var 1A 01 /var> is to <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> country and <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00170_MERLWYB<tab>Je n'ai d'obligation qu'envers ma cité et mon peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00180_MERLWYB<tab>If you expect us to place the welfare of a foreign power above our own, you're going to be sorely disappointed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00180_MERLWYB<tab>Si tu crois que nous allons risquer notre sécurité pour le bien-être d'une nation étrangère, tu te trompes cruellement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00190_MERLWYB<tab>Lest you doubt, Limsa comes first, then the Alliance, and finally─circumstances permitting─Ishgard and the rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00190_MERLWYB<tab>L'intérêt de Limsa Lominsa passe en premier, suivie de l'Alliance, puis, si les cir<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>ces le permettent, d'Ishgard et du reste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00200_MERLWYB<tab>If you cannot understand so simple a concept, then you have no place at this table.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00200_MERLWYB<tab>Si tu ne peux pas comprendre un concept aussi simple, tu n'as sans doute pas ta place à cette table.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Forgive me, Admiral. I was...careless in my choice of words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pardonnez-moi, Amirale. J'aurais dû être plus prudent avant de parler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00220_RAUBAHN<tab>I suggest you assemble a party of elite adventurers, assuming you haven't already. Your fellows served us well during Operation Archon. I daresay they will do so again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00220_RAUBAHN<tab>Je te conseille vivement de rassembler un corps d'aventuriers d'élite, tout comme lors de “la marche des Preux”, si ce n'est pas déjà le cas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00230_RAUBAHN<tab>If I may, Your Grace, I wish to propose a redistribution of forces.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00230_RAUBAHN<tab>Si vous le permettez, Votre Altesse, j'aimerais proposer une réor<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion de nos forces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00240_RAUBAHN<tab>If we entrust the security of Ul'dah to the Brass Blades for a time, we can dispatch a larger force to Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00240_RAUBAHN<tab>En confiant momentanément la protection d'Ul'dah aux lames de cuivre, nous devrions être capables d'envoyer un plus large contingent à la rescousse d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00250_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00250_RAUBAHN<tab>Votre Altesse...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00260_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yes, yes of course. Do what you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00260_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Ah, euh, oui. Fais comme bon te semble, Raubahn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00270_RAUBAHN<tab>Is Her Grace not feeling well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00270_RAUBAHN<tab>Son Altesse ne se sent pas bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00280_LADYINWAITING2<tab>To the best of my knowledge, Her Grace is in perfect health.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00280_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Autant que je sache, Sa Grâce est en parfaite santé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00290_RAUBAHN<tab>I see. Carry on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_D00290_RAUBAHN<tab>Tant mieux, dans ce cas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>O Sultantree, hallowed spirit of my line...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Seigneur Sasagan, j'ai honte de moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Through my weakness, the glorious House of Ul has all but disappeared beneath the sands. For want of the strength to raise it up again, it were better that it fall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>La dynastie Ul n'est plus que l'ombre d'elle-même, et la faute m'en revient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Forgive me, but I know not what else to do...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_F00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pardonnez-moi, je ne vois pas d'autre recours...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>You needn't trouble yourself so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu n'aurais pas dû te donner cette peine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Your Grace is most kind, but it is no trouble to me, rather an honor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Votre Altesse est généreuse, mais ce serait manquer à mes devoirs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00030_LADYINWAITING2<tab>If Your Grace is ready, I shall summon the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00030_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Si Votre Grâce le permet, je vais appeler l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_G00040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous t'en prions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00010_KANESENNA<tab>I take it you have grown accustomed to your responsibilities?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00010_KANESENNA<tab>Alors, Sire Aymeric, vous êtes-vous habitué à votre nouvelle position<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00020_AYMERIC<tab>The day-to-day duties are not so demanding. The social obligations, on the other hand...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00020_AYMERIC<tab>Les res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés quotidiennes ne sont pas trop astreignantes, mais je dois avouer qu'il en est autrement des obligations sociales...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00030_MINFILIA<tab> Everyone looks to be in high spirits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00030_MINFILIA<tab>Tout le monde semble de bonne humeur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>With good cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et pour cause.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00050_MINFILIA<tab>A common victory may serve to unite even the most unlikely of allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00050_MINFILIA<tab>Une bataille durement gagnée permet souvent de rassembler les personnes les plus divisées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00060_MINFILIA<tab>You've brought us one step closer to a united Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00060_MINFILIA<tab>Grâce à toi, nous avons fait un pas de plus vers une Éorzéa unie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your modesty knows no bounds, Antecedent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ta modestie ne connaît donc aucune limite, Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Were it not for your efforts, Ser Aymeric would never have become such a steadfast ally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sire Aymeric ne serait pas devenu un allié aussi important sans ton soutien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>When he convinces his countrymen to rejoin the Alliance, we shall all reap the benefits─military <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> economic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lorsqu'il aura convaincu ses compatriotes de rejoindre l'Alliance éorzéenne, nous jouirons tous des avantages que cela nous apportera, tant militairement qu'économiquement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>I tell you, we are on the cusp of a new era of unity and prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Crois-moi, nous sommes sur le point d'entrer dans une nouvelle ère d'unité et de prospérité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Territorial disputes are all that divide us now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00110_ALPHINAUD<tab>La seule chose qui continue de nous diviser sont des différends territoriaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00120_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I have faith that we will find an amicable solution in time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais je suis persuadé qu'à terme, nous arriverons à trouver une solution pacifique à ce problème.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00130_ALPHINAUD<tab>And failing that, I'll have my trusty Warrior of Light box the ears of all concerned. Speaking of whom...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00130_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Avec l'aide, notamment, de notre Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière... qui ne semble pas être parmi les invités.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00140_MINFILIA<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will be joining us shortly. A matter at the Quicksand required <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> attention, but it did not sound serious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_H00140_MINFILIA<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> ne devrait pas tarder à arriver. Une affaire l'a obligé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à se rendre aux Sables mouvants, mais ça n'avait pas l'air grave.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Enter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Entre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Your Grace. Your guest has arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Votre invité<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> est arrivé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, Votre Altesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pray come in, and take your ease.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_I00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous sommes désolée de t'avoir mandé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aussi sou<var 16 /var>dai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00010_MERLWYB<tab>'Tis well that the Steps of Faith held against the Horde.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00010_MERLWYB<tab>Je suis soulagée de savoir que l'Avancée de la Foi a résisté à l'assaut des Dravaniens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00020_KANESENNA<tab>And what of the city proper?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00020_KANESENNA<tab>Qu'en est-il de la sainte Cité<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00030_AYMERIC<tab>We sustained some few losses, but the heart of our nation yet beats with vigor. I am not certain I could say the same had we not received your most generous aid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00030_AYMERIC<tab>Nous avons subi quelques pertes, mais le cœur d'Ishgard continue de battre avec vigueur. Je ne pourrais cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas en dire autant, si nous n'avions pas reçu votre généreux soutien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00040_RAUBAHN<tab>An attack on Ishgard is an attack on the realm. We stand together or fall divided.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00040_RAUBAHN<tab>Ishgard fait tout autant partie d'Éorzéa que nous. Dans ce genre de situation, nous devons nous serrer les coudes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Such noble words...after the fact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tant de belles paroles après les faits...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00060_AYMERIC<tab>I had hoped to speak in the presence of Her Grace, but it seems she has been delayed... That being the case, now would seem as good a time as any...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00060_AYMERIC<tab>Je désirais attendre que Son Altesse fasse son apparition, mais le moment me paraît bien choisi pour faire une allocution...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00070_AYMERIC<tab>Honored friends! Pray allow me to convey Ishgard's warmest gratitude for your part in the defense of our lands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00070_AYMERIC<tab>Amis et alliés<var 1D /var>! Permettez-moi de vous exprimer la sincère gratitude d'Ishgard pour la part que vous avez jouée dans la défense de notre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00080_AYMERIC<tab>'Tis upon the success of this very alliance that my recommendation to throw open the Gates of Judgement shall be founded. With the blessing of the archbishop, it is my hope that Ishgard will soon be reunited with her long-estranged sister nations─and that Eorzea shall once more be as one!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00080_AYMERIC<tab>Sur la base du succès de cette alliance, j'espère bien convaincre l'Archevêque d'ouvrir les Portes du Jugement et d'accueillir enfin nos États frères entre nos murs après tant d'années<var 1D /var>! Éorzéa sera à nouveau unie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Yuyuhase<var 1D /var>? Très bien, j'arrive.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00100_MINFILIA<tab>Is aught amiss?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00100_MINFILIA<tab>Quelque chose ne va pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nothing to worry about. I shall return anon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce n'est rien de grave. Je reviens tout de suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00120_ALPHINAUD<tab>You wished a word, Yuyuhase?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_J00120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu désires me parler, Yuyuhase<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>You may go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00010_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu peux prendre congé de nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Your Grace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00020_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Votre Grâce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>You must be curious as to the reason for this private audience. The matter I would discuss, however, will soon make apparent the need for discretion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu te demandes sûrement pour quelle raison nous t'accordons cette audience en privé. La question que nous allons aborder te permettra de comprendre pourquoi la discrétion est de mise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I intend to abdicate the throne and dissolve the monarchy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous avons l'intention de mettre un terme au sultanat d'Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>You have seen for yourself the storm of turmoil that howls through our streets. The government fails in its responsibilities, and my subjects suffer the consequences of our incompetence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu as pu constater par toi-même la tourmente qui fait rage dans nos rues. Les dirigeants manquent à leurs devoirs, et ce sont nos sujets qui payent le prix de cette in<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But I will see them suffer no longer. The victory feast shall provide the stage on which I declare the dissolution of the sultanate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Mais nous ne les laisserons pas souffrir davantage. La célébration de la victoire nous donne l'occasion parfaite de déclarer la fin du sultanat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>'Tis mine intent that the ruling class of our golden city should take its place beside the common man in a fair and equitable republic. No more shall this nation bow to the whims of a privileged few.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous avons l'intention de remplacer la classe dirigeante de la Cité d'or par une république juste et impartiale. Notre État ne se soumettra plus à la volonté de quelques privilégiés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yet that which I propose will entail the tearing up of this city's very foundations. And even Raubahn with all his strength and influence will be hard-pressed to keep his footing on such treacherous ground.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Cette décision va ébranler les fondations de tout ce que nous avons connu. Aussi fort et influent qu'il soit, Raubahn aura beaucoup de mal à se faire entendre seul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Thus would I ask you to lend him a steadying hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est pourquoi nous souhaitons que tu lui apportes ton soutien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>You who have endured the wrath of innumerable foes are the one hero in whom I can place my trust. Will you do this thing for me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu as affronté avec succès les ennemis les plus dangereux et tu es un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var> à qui nous pouvons faire confiance. Veux-tu bien faire ça pour nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I am truly grateful. More grateful than I can well express.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous te sommes re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante... de tout notre cœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00120_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>How much we have both changed since that day we met beneath the Sultantree... And the days ahead promise to change us further still. I hope that we will recognize ourselves when all of this is over...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00120_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous avons tou<var 08 E905 ((te)) (()) /var>s les deux bien changé depuis cette rencontre au pied de l'Arbre du Sultan, et les jours à venir vont sûrement nous changer encore plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Much of my dread for the coming days has been quieted...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nos appréhensions pour le futur n'ont plus lieu d'être, désormais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00140_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Your Grace!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00140_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Votre Altesse<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Her Grace... The sultana is dead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Par tous les Dieux... Sa Grâce est morte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00160_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Poison in her wine...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00160_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Du poison dans son vin...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00170_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>You! You did this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00170_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>C'est toi<var 1D /var>! Tu l'as assassinée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00180_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Spare us your denials! I see no other suspects, and the room has but the one entrance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00180_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>N'espère pas pouvoir nier ton crime<var 1D /var>! Je ne vois aucun autre suspect ici, et cette pièce n'a qu'une seule porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00190_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I hereby accuse you of regicide! Men─arrest this viper!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00190_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Tu es coupable de régicide<var 1D /var>! Gardes, arrêtez <var 08 E905 ((cette meurtrière)) ((ce meurtrier)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00200_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>(-Brass Blade-)Sir! You're coming with us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_K00200_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>(-Lame de cuivre-)À vos ordres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00010_ALPHINAUD<tab><gasp>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00020_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-Crystal Brave-)Sir. Barring a few exceptions, we have detained all those with allegiance to the Scions. The Rising Stones is also under our control.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00020_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-Brave du Cristal-)La plupart des Héritiers ont été mis aux arrêts. Le Refuge des roches est également sous contrôle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>And what do you hope to achieve with this mutiny?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'espères-tu accomplir avec cette mutinerie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00040_YUYUHASE<tab>Why, that which we have striven for all along, Commander: the salvation of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_L00040_YUYUHASE<tab>Mais exactement ce que vous avez toujours espéré réaliser, Commandant<var 1D /var>: servir les intérêts d'Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00010_RAUBAHN<tab>What is the meaning of this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00010_RAUBAHN<tab>Mais qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00020_AYMERIC<tab>Knights from the homeland? This cannot bode well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00020_AYMERIC<tab>Des chevaliers d'Ishgard<var 1D /var>? Voilà qui n'augure rien de bon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Lord Commander. We have received an urgent message from the Holy See.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Sire Aymeric, un message vient de nous parvenir d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I am grieved to report that your serpentine foes have resumed their assault. Needless to say, your presence is urgently required. These knights have come to bear you swiftly home to Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Il semblerait que vos ennemis aient lancé un nouvel assaut, et votre retour est demandé d'urgence. Ces chevaliers sont venus pour vous escorter jusqu'à la sainte Cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00050_AYMERIC<tab>...A surprise attack?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00050_AYMERIC<tab>... Une attaque surprise<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00060_LUCIA<tab>We've had no such word from our men. And the timing is most fortuitous to catch us away from the city...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00060_LUCIA<tab>Nous n'avons reçu aucun rapport de ce genre, Capitaine général. Le moment de cet assaut semble idéalement coïncider avec notre absence de la cité...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00070_AYMERIC<tab>Most fortuitous indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00070_AYMERIC<tab>En effet, oui...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00080_TEMPLEKNIGHT02400<tab>Lord Commander, we must away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00080_TEMPLEKNIGHT02400<tab>Capitaine général, nous devons partir au plus vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00090_AYMERIC<tab>You have been a most gracious host. I hope that I might one day return the favor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00090_AYMERIC<tab>L'accueil dans votre belle cité a été des plus agréables. J'espère que j'aurai un jour l'occasion de vous rendre la pareille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00100_AYMERIC<tab>Come, Lucia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_M00100_AYMERIC<tab>Allons-y, Lucia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00010_THANCRED<tab>Whatever is going on in there...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00010_THANCRED<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est que tout ce raffut<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00020_THANCRED<tab>Ah, the ever-dutiful Brass Blades. I must apologize, but my dance card is rather full. Another time, perhaps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00020_THANCRED<tab>Oh, j'ignorais que j'avais des admirateurs même chez les lames de cuivre. Vous m'en voyez désolé, messieurs, mais j'ai un certain penchant pour la gent féminine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00030_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Thancred of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. You stand accused of committing acts of espionage in service to the Garlean Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00030_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Thancred des Héritiers de la Septième Aube, tu es accusé d'avoir espionné pour le compte de l'empire de Garlemald<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00040_THANCRED<tab>Espionage? What in the seven hells are you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00040_THANCRED<tab>Espionné<var 1D /var>? Moi<var 1D /var>? Mais de quoi parlez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00050_THANCRED<tab>Ah. If you're referring to that business with the Ultima Weapon, then you must understand─I-I wasn't myself...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00050_THANCRED<tab>Ah, si c'est en rapport avec le conflit contre la 14e légion, vous devez savoir qu'à l'époque, je n'étais pas moi-même...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00060_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Under interrogation, an imperial prisoner revealed your involvement in numerous dealings with the enemy. We've also been investigating reports that you are a practitioner of forbidden arts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00060_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>L'interrogatoire d'un prisonnier impérial a révélé ton implication dans nombre d'échanges avec l'ennemi. Nous avons également découvert des rapports indiquant que tu t'adonnes à des pratiques interdites.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00070_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>You'd best come along with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00070_BRASSBLADE02400<tab>Tu ferais mieux d'obtempérer et de nous suivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00080_THANCRED<tab>You invite me to your party and now you want me to leave? I do so detest receiving mixed signals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00080_THANCRED<tab>On m'invite à une réception, et maintenant on me dit de partir<var 1D /var>? J'ai horreur des gens qui envoient des signaux contradictoires...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00090_THANCRED<tab>Come, then. I believe I've lost my appetite for this farce of a celebration!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_N00090_THANCRED<tab>De toute façon, cette farce m'a coupé toute envie de rester ici plus longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00010_RAUBAHN<tab>You go too far, Lord Adeledji! By what right do you march armed soldiers into a royal banquet and eject state visitors without Her Grace's consent!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00010_RAUBAHN<tab>Vous allez trop loin, Teledji Adeledji<var 1D /var>! De quel droit envoyez-vous des gardes en plein banquet officiel et congédiez-vous des émissaires étrangers sans l'accord de Son Altesse<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00020_RAUBAHN<tab>You treat the Brass Blades as your personal army, and show contempt for the throne with your every act. Leave us. Now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00020_RAUBAHN<tab>Vous agissez comme si les lames de cuivre étaient à vos ordres et méprisez l'autorité du sultanat<var 1D /var>! Quittez cette salle sur-le-champ<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Is that an order, General? Mayhap you have mistaken me for one of your Flames? You will find I am not so slavishly obedient. And you lecture <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> on personal armies!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00030_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Voulez-vous me faire croire que les Immortels n'obéissent pas à tous vos caprices, Général<var 1D /var>? Laissez-moi vous dire que vous êtes mal placé pour me donner des leçons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>As for your <var 1A 02 /var>outrageous<var 1A 01 /var> claim that I have shown contempt for the throne, let all here observe that it was not <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who feasted while an assassin removed its occupant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Et je peux dif<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment faire preuve de mépris pour l'autorité du sultanat, lorsqu'un assassin a ôté la vie à sa re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00050_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I expect this is your idea of defending the nation, is it? This and diluting our forces through these distractions in Carteneau and Coerthas!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00050_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>La défense de notre État n'est-elle pas de votre res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té<var 1D /var>? Ah, mais vous étiez apparemment trop occupé à éparpiller nos troupes à Carteneau et dans le Coerthas pour vous en soucier, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I do begin to see how the ranks of the Immortal Flames came to be riddled with Garlean sympathizers! You are plainly unfit for command!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>En fait, je doute franchement de votre capacité à commander, étant donné que vos propres rangs cachaient un nid d'espions impériaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00070_RAUBAHN<tab>Wait... Wait, gods damn you! Your words make no sense. What assassin?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00070_RAUBAHN<tab>... Un assassin<var 1D /var>? Ici, au palais<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00080_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>You mean to say you don't know!? We caught the vaunted champion of the Scions in Her Grace's private chambers not moments after the deed was done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00080_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Exactement<var 1D /var>! Nous avons surpris cet<var 08 E905 ((te aventurière)) (( aventurier)) /var> des Héritiers de la Septième Aube dans les appartements privés de Son Altesse peu de temps après son méfait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00090_MINFILIA<tab>No─ No, this cannot be!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00090_MINFILIA<tab>Vous ne croyez quand même pas que...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Save your breath. You will need it to plead your case. You and your entire order are to be tried for this atrocity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Jusqu'à preuve du contraire, votre or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion tout entière est tenue pour responsable de cette atrocité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Bring in the prisoner!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_O00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Qu'on emmène ces prisonniers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00010_ILBERD<tab>This <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> stands accused of poisoning Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo. And as suspected accessories to the crime, all members of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn will be detained for questioning!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00010_ILBERD<tab>Cet<var 08 E905 ((te)) (()) /var> <var 08 E905 ((fe)) ((ho)) /var>mme est accusé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'avoir assassiné Sa Majesté Nanamo Ul Namo. Et en tant que complices de ce crime, tous les membres des Héritiers de la Septième Aube ont été arrêtés pour être interrogés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00020_MINFILIA<tab>This is madness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00020_MINFILIA<tab>Ça ne peut pas être vrai<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00030_ILBERD<tab>What a pity... Who'd have thought your tale would end like this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00030_ILBERD<tab>Quel étrange coup du sort<var 1D /var>! Qui aurait cru qu'un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var> comme vous finirait ainsi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Should you demand further proof, a vial with traces of the substance used to poison Her Grace was found upon the assassin's person.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Si vous avez des doutes, sachez que nous avons découvert une fiole du même poison que celui qui a tué Sa Grâce dans les effets de l'accusé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00050_YSHTOLA<tab>How very convenient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00050_YSHTOLA<tab>Comme par hasard...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>You would speak of convenience?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Oh, vous voulez parler de hasard<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Who persuaded Her Grace to host this celebration? A diversion which presented you and your confederates ample opportunity to commit the crime, and a crowd within which to fade from view! A more “convenient” occasion I could scarcely imagine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Est-ce vraiment un “hasard” que ce soit vous qui avez convaincu Sa Grâce d'organiser ce banquet avec les Ishgardais, et ainsi détourné l'attention de tous, vous donnant la parfaite occasion de l'assassiner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00080_MINFILIA<tab>How dare you! After all we have done for Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00080_MINFILIA<tab>Comment osez-vous porter de telles accusations<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Hold your tongue, witch! I'll not be ensorcelled! I know all about the dark gift that you and your disciples wield!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Silence, vile enchanteresse<var 1D /var>! Ne croyez pas pouvoir me duper avec la sorcellerie que nous savons vous et vos disciples pratiquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Oh, yes...I've observed how you worked upon the minds of the Alliance leaders, bending them to your will!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00100_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Oh, oui, je vous ai vue user de ces charmes pour contrôler les âmes des chefs de l'Alliance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>And what of your <var 1A 02 /var>cordial<var 1A 01 /var> relationship with Ser Aymeric? For years, Ishgard abjured all contact with the outside world, and now the lord commander of the Temple Knights treats you with the familiarity of a childhood friend!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>N'oublions pas vos liens étroits avec sire Aymeric. Vous sembliez en effet être très intime avec l'émissaire de ce peuple tristement réputé pour sa froide morgue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00120_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I'll tell you what I think─I think this desperate defense of Ishgard was but a ruse to deceive us into dividing our forces.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00120_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Laissez-moi vous dire ce que je pense<var 1D /var>: cette bataille pour la défense d'Ishgard n'était qu'une ruse pour nous tromper et disperser nos troupes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00130_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Your next move will be to charm your Coerthan allies into invading our lands!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00130_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Maintenant que nous sommes affaiblis et désorganisés, vous allez convaincre vos alliés du Coerthas d'envahir nos terres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00140_PAPALYMO<tab>Now that is truly ridiculous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00140_PAPALYMO<tab>C'est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ridicule<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00150_YDA<tab>How do you even think of this stuff!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00150_YDA<tab>Mais d'où sortez-vous toutes ces âneries<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00160_RAUBAHN<tab>She... She cannot be dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00160_RAUBAHN<tab>Non... Elle ne peut pas être morte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00170_RAUBAHN<tab>Stand aside, Ilberd! I want to see the sultana!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00170_RAUBAHN<tab>Écarte-toi, Ilberd<var 1D /var>! Je dois voir Son Altesse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00180_ILBERD<tab>Spare yourself the pain, brother. I saw her with my own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00180_ILBERD<tab>C'est inutile, mon vieil ami. J'ai vu son cadavre de mes propres yeux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00190_ILBERD<tab>For a mercy, the poison took her swiftly─her handmaiden can attest to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00190_ILBERD<tab>Le poison l'a semble-t-il tuée instantanément. Sa servante peut te le confirmer aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00200_RAUBAHN<tab>This cannot be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00200_RAUBAHN<tab>C'est pas vrai...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00210_RAUBAHN<tab>Nanamo... Nanamo... NOOOOOO!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_P00210_RAUBAHN<tab>Nanamo... NOOOOOON<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00010_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Plainly, the Royalists can no longer be relied upon to keep our nation safe. And so it falls to the Monetarists of the Syndicate to govern Ul'dah. But should you wish to help us, General, we would be more than happy to entrust the task of planning Her Grace's funeral to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00010_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Nous ne pouvons plus confier la sécurité de notre cité aux sultanistes. Le gouvernement d'Ul'dah doit revenir au Cartel, et aux monétaristes. Général, vous feriez mieux de vous concentrer sur les funérailles de Sa Grâce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00020_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>It seems only right that you should bury your precious sultana, and we will be glad to be rid of that burden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00020_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Croyez-moi, vous et votre sultane n'avez été qu'une source de problèmes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00030_RAUBAHN<tab>I'll bet you will. You more than any man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00030_RAUBAHN<tab>C'était donc toi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>...Whatever do you mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Mais... de quoi parlez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00050_RAUBAHN<tab>I mean you had her killed, you black-hearted bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00050_RAUBAHN<tab>Tu as préparé cet assassinat depuis le début<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>What rot! ...Though I did have sufficient motive, 'tis true. That young lady caused me no end of grief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00060_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>C'est absurde. Je dois toutefois reconnaître que cette gamine m'en a fait voir de toutes les couleurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>She always was a most unwilling puppet. I daresay Her Grace was grateful that someone thought to cut her strings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00070_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Nanamo n'était pas destinée à devenir autre chose qu'une marionnette. Maintenant que les fils ont été tranchés, elle peut enfin reposer en paix au royaume de Thal, si vous voulez mon avis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00080_RAUBAHN<tab>You would mock her? THEN MOCK HER FROM HELL!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00080_RAUBAHN<tab>Mais tu n'as donc aucun respect pour son âme<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Wha─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00090_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Arghl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00100_LOLORITO<tab>Have you lost your mind, General!? It is forbidden to draw steel in the royal chambers, much less slaughter our fellow Syndicate members!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00100_LOLORITO<tab>Avez-vous perdu la tête, Général<var 1D /var>!? Il est interdit de dégainer son arme dans le palais, et encore moins de tuer un membre du Cartel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00110_LOLORITO<tab><gasp> ...You're one of them! You've been in league with the Scions all along!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00110_LOLORITO<tab>... Vous êtes avec eux<var 1D /var>! Oui, vous avez collaboré avec les Héritiers pendant tout ce temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00120_RAUBAHN<tab>YOU! You're next, you scheming bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00120_RAUBAHN<tab>Toi aussi, tu vas payer... Misérable vermine...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00130_RAUBAHN<tab>AAARRRGH!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00130_RAUBAHN<tab>AAaaaaarrrRRhhhh<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00140_MERLWYB<tab>Seven hells!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00140_MERLWYB<tab>Par les sept enfers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00150_KANESENNA<tab>Raubahn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00150_KANESENNA<tab>Raubahn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00160_GUARD02500<tab>(-Maelstrom Soldier-)Admiral, we must leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00160_GUARD02500<tab>(-Soldat du Maelstrom-)Amirale, nous devons partir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00170_MERLWYB<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00170_MERLWYB<tab>Malédiction<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00180_ILBERD<tab>How unlike you, old friend. I did not expect to take your arm so easily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00180_ILBERD<tab>Ça ne te ressemble pas de te laisser vaincre aussi facilement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00230_LOLORITO<tab>Take the Scions into custody! They have conspired to commit regicide!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00230_LOLORITO<tab>Qu'on mette les Héritiers de la Septième Aube en détention<var 1D /var>! Ils ont conspiré dans le but d'assassiner la Sultane et de renverser le gouvernement d'Ul'dah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00240_LOLORITO<tab>And arrest this traitor as well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00240_LOLORITO<tab>Et emmenez ce traître aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00190_RAUBAHN<tab>Ilberd! I hope you choke on their coin!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00190_RAUBAHN<tab>Ilberd... Tu t'es laissé acheter par ces chiens...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00200_ILBERD<tab>'Tis better than the dirt I've supped on these long years. We can't all abandon Ala Mhigo and become great war heroes as you have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00200_ILBERD<tab>J'en avais juste marre de vivre dans la boue et la misère. Tout le monde ne peut pas abandonner Ala Mhigo et devenir un héros comme toi, tu sais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00210_ILBERD<tab>You are not the man you once were, Raubahn. Since that girl strapped the yoke around your neck, you've become docile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00210_ILBERD<tab>Mais tu n'es plus le même homme qu'avant, Raubahn. Tu es devenu si docile depuis que la Sultane t'a mis sous son joug.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00220_ILBERD<tab>She took the mad bull and cut off his balls. And a bull that cannot rut is fit for naught but slaughter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00220_ILBERD<tab>Elle a su saisir le taureau et lui briser ses cornes... Et un taureau qui ne peut plus se battre est juste bon pour l'abattoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00250_ILBERD<tab>Shall I tell you who really killed your precious sultana?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00250_ILBERD<tab>Raubahn, tu veux savoir qui a vraiment tué ta sultane<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00251_ILBERD<tab>...It was me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00251_ILBERD<tab>... C'est moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00260_RAUBAHN<tab>You! You die!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00260_RAUBAHN<tab>Je vais te tuer<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00270_ILBERD<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00270_ILBERD<tab>Hmpf<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00280_RAUBAHN<tab>I never doubted you. Not for a moment. But there is more to this than I yet understand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00280_RAUBAHN<tab>Je n'ai pas cru un instant que vous aviez assassiné Nanamo... Il reste trop de parts d'ombre dans ce coup monté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00290_RAUBAHN<tab>Flee this place. Clear your names.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00290_RAUBAHN<tab>Vous devez fuir et laver vos noms de cette infamie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00300_RAUBAHN<tab>Find out who is behind this plot! It is the only way! Now go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00300_RAUBAHN<tab>Trouvez qui est derrière ce complot<var 1D /var>! C'est la seule solution<var 1D /var>! Partez<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00310_RAUBAHN<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00310_RAUBAHN<tab>Woaaaaaaarrrh<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00320_THANCRED<tab>Ah, there you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00320_THANCRED<tab>Ah, vous voilà enfin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00330_YSHTOLA<tab>Thancred! Where have you been?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00330_YSHTOLA<tab>Thancred<var 1D /var>! Mais où étais-tu passé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00340_THANCRED<tab>Avoiding the fumbling advances of some very persistent admirers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00340_THANCRED<tab>J'essayais de repousser les avances un peu trop véhémentes de certains “admirateurs”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00341_THANCRED<tab>When I realized the celebrations had turned sour, it seemed prudent to slip away and take stock of the situation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00341_THANCRED<tab>Lorsque j'ai réalisé que le banquet de célébration tournait au vinaigre, j'ai préféré m'éclipser et faire le point sur la situation au calme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00350_THANCRED<tab>'Twould appear that much of the city is already under tight guard. It occurs to me that expanding the Brass Blades' authority may not have been such a wonderful idea after all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00350_THANCRED<tab>On dirait bien que la cité est sous bonne garde. Donner un plus grand pouvoir aux lames de cuivre n'était pas une excellente idée, après tout...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00360_PAPALYMO<tab>The success of this plan was contingent upon those thugs having the run of the place. Just how long has this scheme been in motion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00360_PAPALYMO<tab>Les plans de quelqu'un dépendaient apparemment du contrôle de l'endroit par ces sales brutes. Depuis combien de temps ce complot est-il en marche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00370_YSHTOLA<tab>The careful preparations, the maneuvering of forces... I am inclined to agree with the General's insistence that a deeper plot exists here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00370_YSHTOLA<tab>Des pré<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tions méticuleuses, le déploiement rapide d'unités... J'ai tendance à croire que le général Aldynn a raison lorsqu'il dit que tout ceci cache des machinations bien plus complexes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00380_YDA<tab>So...would I be right in thinking we now have an excuse to pummel as many Brass Blades as we like?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00380_YDA<tab>Il y a beaucoup d'anciens mercenaires parmi les lames de cuivre, et les Braves du Cristal ne sont pas mal non plus. Ça te donne pas envie de te mesurer à eux, Papalymo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00390_PAPALYMO<tab>Unless you plan on pummeling them <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var>, I'm not sure that will greatly aid our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00390_PAPALYMO<tab>La force de nos adversaires n'est pas vraiment la question qui se pose ici, Yda<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00400_MINFILIA<tab>The sultana's assassination was but one part of the scheme. We too were its targets. And though we did not share poor Nanamo's fate, we are yet hobbled by the charges laid at our door. Where now might we seek refuge?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00400_MINFILIA<tab>L'assassinat de la Sultane n'était qu'un élément du complot. Beaucoup d'efforts ont été faits pour discréditer et neutraliser notre or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00410_PAPALYMO<tab>Where indeed. We may safely assume that our foe has thought to have the Rising Stones watched.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00410_PAPALYMO<tab>Dans ce cas, on peut considérer que le Refuge des roches n'est plus un lieu sûr pour nous. Voilà donc ce que ça fait d'être des fugitifs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00420_THANCRED<tab>Forgive me for stating the obvious, but our choice of destination will matter little if we cannot secure an escape route out of Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00420_THANCRED<tab>La première chose à faire, c'est de trouver un moyen de s'échapper du guêpier qu'est devenue Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00430_THANCRED<tab>Happily, I believe I can provide one. Papashan once told me about the passages hidden in the walls of the palace. If I recall correctly, the fireplace in Nanamo's chambers conceals the entrance to a tunnel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00430_THANCRED<tab>Papashan m'a parlé une fois de passages secrets dans les murs du palais. Si je me souviens bien, leur entrée se trouve dans la cheminée des appartements de Nanamo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00440_THANCRED<tab>It should lead outside the city, and allow us to avoid any messy confrontations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00440_THANCRED<tab>Ça devrait nous conduire hors de la cité et nous permettre d'éviter toute rencontre indésirable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00450_YDA<tab>The rest of you go on ahead. I'll handle this lot!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00450_YDA<tab>Prenez les devants. Je vais m'occuper d'eux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00460_PAPALYMO<tab>By yourself!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00460_PAPALYMO<tab>Toute seule<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00461_PAPALYMO<tab><sigh> ...I suppose I shall just have to join you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00461_PAPALYMO<tab>Je crois plutôt que tu vas avoir besoin de mon aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00480_YDA<tab>Crystal Braves, too, huh? Now <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> should be interesting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00480_YDA<tab>J'ai toujours rêvé de me frotter aux Braves du Cristal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00470_MINFILIA<tab>Yda! Papalymo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00470_MINFILIA<tab>Yda<var 1D /var>! Papalymo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00490_PAPALYMO<tab>We will hold our pursuers here. Hurry, now! Find this tunnel of Thancred's!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00490_PAPALYMO<tab>Nous allons les retenir. Dépêchez-vous<var 1D /var>! Trouvez ces fameux passages secrets<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00500_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia! We cannot linger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Q00500_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>! Nous devons faire vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00010_YDA<tab>Ow! Now look what you've done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00010_YDA<tab>Ça... tu vas me le payer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00020_PAPALYMO<tab>Yda, are you all right!? There are just too many of them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00020_PAPALYMO<tab>Ça va, Yda<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Bon sang, ils sont trop nombreux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00030_YDA<tab>I'm fine! I could do this all day! How about you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00030_YDA<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas pour moi<var 1D /var>! Je pourrais faire ça toute la journée<var 1D /var>! Et toi, tu t'en sors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00040_PAPALYMO<tab>...Nearing the end of my tether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00040_PAPALYMO<tab>Je vais pas pouvoir tenir longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00050_YDA<tab>This is so <var 1A 02 /var>stupid<var 1A 01 /var>! We're the Scions of the Seventh Dawn! The ones who stand between this realm and the evil that's trying to destroy it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00050_YDA<tab>Les Héritiers sont ici pour protéger ce continent du mal qui cherche à le détruire<var 1D /var>! Nous ne laisserons personne nous arrêter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00060_PAPALYMO<tab>And if you think we'll leave the stewardship of Eorzea to the likes of your masters, then you're sorely mistaken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00060_PAPALYMO<tab>Si vous croyez que nous allons laisser Éorzéa être régie par vos maîtres, vous vous fourrez le doigt dans l'œil<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00070_YDA<tab>Sorry I dragged you into this, Papalymo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00070_YDA<tab>Je suis désolée de t'avoir entraîné là-dedans, Papalymo...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00080_PAPALYMO<tab>Hah, 'tis hardly the first time. And I'll be damned if it will be the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00080_PAPALYMO<tab>Bah, ce n'est pas la première fois... et je doute que ce soit la dernière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00090_PAPALYMO<tab>Let them have it, Yda!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00090_PAPALYMO<tab>Finissons-en avec eux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00100_YDA<tab>I was hoping you'd say that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_R00100_YDA<tab>J'étais impatiente que tu me dises ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00010_MINFILIA<tab>I never knew such a watercourse existed beneath Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00010_MINFILIA<tab>J'ignorais l'existence d'une telle voie d'eau sous Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00020_YSHTOLA<tab>The architecture is of the Sil'dihn style, if I am not mistaken. The ancients plainly foresaw the need for a ready means of escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00020_YSHTOLA<tab>Elle a pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment été aménagée pour l'usage que nous en faisons maintenant. L'architecture est plutôt ancienne... héritée des Sildiens, je dirais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00030_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-???-)This way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00030_CRYSTALBRAVE02400<tab>(-Poursuivant-)Par ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00040_THANCRED<tab>Well, that didn't take long. It seems these tunnels were not as secret as I had hoped.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00040_THANCRED<tab>Eh bien, ça ne leur a pas pris beaucoup de temps. Ces tunnels ne sont apparemment pas aussi secrets que je l'espérais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00050_YSHTOLA<tab>You two go on ahead. Thancred and I will deal with this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00050_YSHTOLA<tab>Continuez, tous les deux. Thancred et moi allons rester en arrière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00060_MINFILIA<tab>Wh-What do you mean to do!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00060_MINFILIA<tab>Qu'est-ce que vous allez faire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Only that which is required to ensure that the dawn's light survive to brighten the morrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas. Ce qui importe, c'est que la lumière de l'aube continue de briller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00080_THANCRED<tab>Fear not, Antecedent. You haven't seen the last of these fair features.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00080_THANCRED<tab>N'ayez crainte, Minfilia. J'ai bien l'intention de vous revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00090_MINFILIA<tab>My friends...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00090_MINFILIA<tab>Mes amis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00100_YSHTOLA<tab>Leave us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00100_YSHTOLA<tab>Allez-y, vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00110_THANCRED<tab>What is the plan, milady? Shall I take the dozen on the left, and you the dozen on the right? The odds are not exactly stacked in our favor...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00110_THANCRED<tab>Les chances ne sont pas vraiment de notre côté...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00120_YSHTOLA<tab>Numbers will count for little when I bring the tunnel down upon their heads. Though I cannot say I relish the thought of being entombed with you for all eternity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00120_YSHTOLA<tab>Leur nombre n'importera plus lorsque j'aurai fait s'effondrer le tunnel sur leurs têtes... Je dois toutefois avouer que je ne suis pas émerveillée par l'idée d'être ensevelie avec toi pour toujours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00130_THANCRED<tab>You wound me! I will have you know that many a maid would <var 1A 02 /var>kill<var 1A 01 /var> for the chance to spend forever at my side! Now, may I have the last dance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00130_THANCRED<tab>Nombre de demoiselles tueraient pour avoir cette chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00140_THANCRED<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00140_THANCRED<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00150_THANCRED<tab>Well, this is going splendidly... Now would be a good time, milady!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00150_THANCRED<tab>Tout va pour le mieux... Mais je crois qu'il est temps, Y'shtola<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00160_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00160_YSHTOLA<tab>Je suis prête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00170_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, Mhitra...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00170_YSHTOLA<tab>Pardonne-moi, Y'mhitra...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00180_THANCRED<tab>Farewell, Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_S00180_THANCRED<tab>Adieu, douce Minfilia...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00010_MINFILIA<tab>Hydaelyn... She speaks to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00010_MINFILIA<tab>Hydaelyn... Elle s'adresse à moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00020_MINFILIA<tab>No!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00020_MINFILIA<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00030_MINFILIA<tab>I must remain behind...but you cannot stay with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00030_MINFILIA<tab>Je dois rester ici... seule.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00040_MINFILIA<tab>Please, you must go on! You are the Warrior of Light! You are <var 1A 02 /var>hope<var 1A 01 /var>─for the Scions, and for all the realm!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00040_MINFILIA<tab>Je t'en supplie, tu es <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière de la Lumière)) ((le Guerrier de la Lumière)) /var><var 1D /var>! Tu es l'espoir<var 1D /var>! Pour nous Héritiers et pour Éorzéa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00050_MINFILIA<tab>As long as your flame continues to burn, the light of the dawn may ever be relit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00050_MINFILIA<tab>Tant que ta flamme continuera de brûler, la lumière de l'aube pourra être rallumée, encore et encore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00060_MINFILIA<tab>You must escape, and save Eorzea from those who would plunge it into darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00060_MINFILIA<tab>Tu dois t'échapper, et sauver cette terre des ténèbres qui la menacent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00070_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis the only way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_T00070_MINFILIA<tab>Il n'y a pas d'autre solution. Sans <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var>, tout espoir est perdu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am glad to see you safe, my friend! What of the others?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je suis heureux de vous savoir sain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et sau<var 08 E905 ((ve)) ((f)) /var>, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Mais où sont les autres<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Damn that man!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Maudit Teledji Adeledji<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Teledji played me for a fool! I thought the Crystal Braves mine till the very moment I felt the blade at my back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il a bien joué son jeu<var 1D /var>! J'ai vraiment cru que les Braves du Cristal étaient à mes ordres jusqu'à ce que je sente une épée dans mon dos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00040_PIPPIN<tab>(-???-)There will be ample time for soul-searching later. For now, we must put some malms between us and Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00040_PIPPIN<tab>(-???-)Nous aurons tout le temps de discuter de ceci plus tard. Pour le moment, nous devons nous éloigner d'Ul'dah au plus vite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00050_BREMONDT<tab>Well, if it ain't the hero of the Scions! You look to me like a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> in need of a nice, relaxin' carriage ride!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00050_BREMONDT<tab>Eh, mais c'est <var 08 E905 ((cette chère héroïne)) ((ce bon vieux héros)) /var> des Héritiers de la Septième Aube<var 1D /var>! J'ai l'impression que tu as besoin de faire une petite promenade en caravane, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00060_BREMONDT<tab>Well, would you look who it is! Need a ride? I doubt it'll be half as excitin' as the last trip we took─not if I have anythin' to say about it, anyway!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00060_BREMONDT<tab>Mais voyez-moi ça<var 1D /var>! C'est mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> l'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> que l'éther enivre<var 1D /var>! Ça te dirait de faire une petite promenade en caravane<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00070_BREMONDT<tab>Let's not dawdle, eh? All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_U00070_BREMONDT<tab>Montez vite<var 1D /var>! Il ne faut pas s'éterniser ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00010_BREMONDT<tab>I was stockin' up on supplies over in Vesper Bay, you see, when your sister come up an' begged a favor. Said her brother was havin' some trouble down in Ul'dah, an' likely needed a helpin' hand gettin' away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00010_BREMONDT<tab>J'étais en train de me réapprovisionner à la baie des Vêpres, lorsque je suis tombé sur votre sœur, voyez-vous. Elle m'a dit que vous aviez des pépins à Ul'dah et besoin qu'on vous tire de là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00020_BREMONDT<tab>Thinkin' them ruins would make a fine hidin' place, I decided to try there first...an' lo an' behold, there you were.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00020_BREMONDT<tab>Je me suis dit que ces ruines feraient une planque idéale, et j'ai donc commencé par chercher par ici... et devinez quoi, c'est là que je vous ai trouvé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00030_BREMONDT<tab>Aye, an' judgin' by them soldiers as were pourin' out of the city, I arrived not a moment too soon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00030_BREMONDT<tab>Si j'en juge par la lueur des lanternes qui venaient de la cité, eh bien je suis arrivé au bon moment. Un peu plus tard, et vous étiez fait comme un rat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00040_BREMONDT<tab>Must've been fate that we happened to find <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> there though, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00040_BREMONDT<tab>Cependant, je dois dire que je n'espérais pas te trouver aussi à cet endroit, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>I had thought to look out for Alisaie, but 'twould appear she was the one watching over me. I've made such a mess of things...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et moi qui pensais veiller sur Alisaie, j'ai bien l'impression que c'est elle qui gardait un œil sur son grand frère. J'aurais vraiment dû être plus vigilant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00060_BREMONDT<tab>An' who might you be, young sir?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00060_BREMONDT<tab>À qui ai-je l'honneur, jeune homme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00070_PIPPIN<tab>Pipin Tarupin, Vice Marshal of the Immortal Flames.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00070_PIPPIN<tab>Je suis Pipin Tarupin, vice-maréchal des Immortels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00080_PIPPIN<tab>I had been on the Ala Mhigan front these past few moons, but an urgent communication called me back to Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00080_PIPPIN<tab>J'ai passé ces dernières lunes sur le front mhigois, mais un appel m'a fait revenir d'urgence à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00090_PIPPIN<tab>Scarce had my boots touched the cobbles, though, when the streets erupted with cries of assassination. I immediately went in search of answers, and came across Master Alphinaud here. Needless to say, I did not think his imprisonment justified.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00090_PIPPIN<tab>J'avais à peine foulé le pavé de la Cité d'or lorsque les cris ont commencé à résonner dans la rue. J'ai im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment cherché à en savoir plus, et c'est comme ça que j'ai trouvé messire Alphinaud. Son arrestation ne m'a pas semblé justifiée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00100_PIPPIN<tab>The blame plainly lies with the Monetarists. Their greed and corruption are well known to me, but for them to take advantage of the situation with such alacrity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00100_PIPPIN<tab>Ce sont clairement les monétaristes qui sont derrière ce coup. Je savais à quel point ils étaient avares et corrompus, mais je dois admettre avoir été surpris par la manière dont ils ont agi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00110_BREMONDT<tab>...Was that “Pipin,” you said? Ain't that the name of General Aldynn's lad?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00110_BREMONDT<tab>... Vous ne seriez pas le fils du général, par hasard<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00120_PIPPIN<tab>Yes, I am his son. Adopted, of course. 'Twas only as we were leaving Ul'dah that I learned of Father's fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00120_PIPPIN<tab>Tout à fait. Son fils adoptif, bien sûr. J'ai appris ce qui lui est arrivé seulement lorsque nous avons quitté Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00130_PIPPIN<tab>Once I have seen you a safe distance away, I mean to return to the city and extricate him from this madness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00130_PIPPIN<tab>Une fois que je vous aurai escortés en lieu sûr, je compte bien retourner là-bas et le tirer de cette situation insensée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00140_BREMONDT<tab>Then you needn't travel no further than Black Brush─our fugitives have a friend waitin' for 'em there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00140_BREMONDT<tab>Vous n'aurez pas à aller plus loin que Roncenoire. Nos fugitifs ont un ami qui les attend là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>I dreamed of bringing about Eorzea's salvation, but in the end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00150_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'avais de grands projets pour le salut d'Éorzéa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twas I who needed saving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_V00160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais en fin de compte, c'est moi qui ai besoin d'être secouru...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>There has been word from the capital. Ishgard has weathered another assault, and 'tis said several wyverns broke through into the city proper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>J'ai reçu un message de notre capitale. Ishgard a subi un nouvel assaut, et apparemment, plusieurs vouivres ont réussi à pénétrer dans la cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00020_HAURCHEFANT<tab>The Temple Knights succeeded in slaying the beasts, but the intrusion prompted orders to further strengthen the guard and to place the city under a perpetual state of alert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00020_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Les templiers ont abattu ces créatures, mais suite à cette intrusion, l'ordre a été donné de renforcer davantage la garde et de placer la ville en état d'alerte continu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00030_HAURCHEFANT<tab>How keenly we feel the loss of our wards at the Gates of Judgement...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00030_HAURCHEFANT<tab>La perte des protections magiques des Portes du Jugement se fait durement ressentir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Yet we must not bemoan our misfortune. Ser Aymeric is safely returned from Ul'dah and once more leads the defense of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>C'est toutefois une bonne chose que sire Aymeric soit revenu d'Ul'dah et assure de nouveau le commandement des défenses d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00050_HAURCHEFANT<tab>As for the matter of your asylum, I am afraid no progress will be made until the threat to our nation has diminished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00050_HAURCHEFANT<tab>En ce qui vous concerne, je crains que nous ne puissions pas beaucoup vous aider tant que la menace qui pèse sur notre État n'aura pas diminué.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>But do not despair! You are not without allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Mais garde espoir, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Toi et tes camarades n'êtes pas sans alliés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>You are more than welcome to shelter here for as long as you wish. Pray think of it as a new headquarters of sorts─the “Falling Snows” or some such!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Vous pouvez rester ici aussi longtemps que vous le voudrez. Nous pouvons même renommer ce bâtiment en “Refuge des neiges”, si le cœur vous en dit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00080_HAURCHEFANT<tab>All frivolity aside, any who come here in search of you will receive no aid from House Fortemps. For once, the Ishgardian reputation for inhospitality shall work in our favor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00080_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Plus sé<var 16 /var>rieu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ceux qui vous poursuivent n'obtiendront aucune aide de la part de la maison Fortemps. La réputation des Ishgardais d'être peu hospitaliers nous fournira un bon alibi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00090_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Agents of Ul'dah will find their every inquiry dismissed, and their every request for entry rebuffed, until such time as their masters have acknowledged your innocence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00090_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Les agents d'Ul'dah se verront refuser toute demande de ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments et ne pourront venir enquêter ici tant que votre innocence n'a pas été rétablie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00100_HAURCHEFANT<tab>You once fought to preserve the honor of my dear friend─'tis a blessing that I may now repay that debt in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00100_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Tu as combattu auparavant pour préserver l'honneur d'un de mes proches amis, et c'est avec plaisir que je te rendrai la pareille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00110_HAURCHEFANT<tab>But let us dwell no more on this. Pray join the rest of your companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00110_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Mais nous avons assez parlé de tout ceci. Va donc rejoindre tes camarades.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>'Tis bitterly cold this day. I suspect there are those who might welcome the warmth your presence brings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_W00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Il fait bien froid, aujourd'hui, et je suis sûr qu'ils ap<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ront d'autant plus la chaleur de ta présence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis all my doing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tout est de ma faute...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believed myself the only one who truly understood Eorzea's woes. And look what that arrogance has wrought.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai cru être le seul à vraiment comprendre les maux qui touchent Éorzéa, et voyez ce que cette arrogance a apporté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>I gave commands, influenced governments with my certainty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai donné des ordres, influencé les dirigeants des États avec mes certitudes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I treated the Crystal Braves, and even the Scions themselves, as pawns in my great scheme to save the realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai traité les Braves du Cristal et les Héritiers de la Septième Aube comme les pions de mes grands projets pour sauver ce continent et ses gens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>But in my headlong rush unto imagined glory, I paid no heed to the ground upon which I trod!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais dans ma quête aveugle de gloire imaginaire, je n'ai pas fait attention au sol que je foulais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>The salvation of Eorzea... What was it that I hoped to achieve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'est-ce que je cherchais à accomplir au juste...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Did I believe that I could rid the realm of every danger and difficulty? That I could defeat the Empire and the Ascians, and find homes for every refugee?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Étais-je assez vaniteux pour croire que je pourrais débarrasser Éorzéa de tous ses problèmes et de ses dangers<var 1D /var>? Que je vaincrais l'Empire et les Asciens<var 1D /var>? Que je trouverais un toit pour tous les réfugiés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh yes, I was so very clever. “Become a guardian of Eorzea,” I implored, and sat back to watch my perfect army cleanse the land of chaos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'étais persuadé qu'il suffirait d'appeler les gens à devenir les “protecteurs d'Éorzéa” et de les regarder nettoyer toute trace du chaos, sans avoir à me salir les mains...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twas all but a means to feed my own vanity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tout ceci n'était qu'un moyen de flatter mon ego.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Only when all is lost do I finally realize the truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et ce n'est que maintenant que tout est perdu que je réalise ceci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00110_TATARU<tab>Oh, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00110_TATARU<tab>Alphinaud...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>So, Master Alphinaud, are you content to remain a broken blade? Is there no flame hot enough to reforge you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00120_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Messire Alphinaud, cela vous réjouit-il d'être comme une lame brisée<var 1D /var>? N'y a-t-il aucune flamme assez brûlante pour vous reforger<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00130_HAURCHEFANT<tab>What of the fine companions who yet stand at your side? I daresay the fires of their determination will soon have you slicing the air again with your customary wit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00130_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Qu'en est-il des braves compagnons qui restent à vos côtés<var 1D /var>? J'ose croire que le feu de leurs volontés vous permettra de fendre l'air à nouveau avec votre vivacité d'esprit habituelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>I hardly deserve such friendship. And besides, where are we to go...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne mérite pas une telle amitié. Et puis, où irions-nous...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00150_TATARU<tab>Alphinaud? If I may...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00150_TATARU<tab>Alphinaud, si je peux me permettre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00160_TATARU<tab>Should this place not serve our purpose, then...then we shall go to Ishgard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00160_TATARU<tab>Si cet endroit ne nous convient pas, alors... alors nous irons à Ishgard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00170_TATARU<tab>Minfilia told me many times: as long as we stand fast against despair, the beacon of hope will never be lost to sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00170_TATARU<tab>Minfilia me l'a souvent répété<var 1D /var>: tant que nous ne baisserons pas les bras, le flambeau de l'espoir ne s'éteindra jamais com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00180_TATARU<tab>Be it in the snow or in the clouds, we few will see that the dawn's light shines again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00180_TATARU<tab>Que ce soit dans la neige ou dans les nuages, le peu que nous sommes fera tout pour que la lumière de l'aube brille de nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00190_TATARU<tab><sniff> <sniff>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00190_TATARU<tab>Oui...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00200_ALPHINAUD<tab>You are right, Tataru, thank you. And thank you for your kind words, Lord Haurchefant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu as raison, Tataru. Merci. Et merci à vous aussi, Sire Haurchefant, pour vos gentilles paroles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis true that Eorzea yet has her guardians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00210_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet, Éorzéa a encore ses vrais protecteurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00220_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Scions have achieved much, and 'twould be remiss of me to discard it all in a fit of self-pity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les Héritiers ont accompli beaucoup de choses, et il serait orgueilleux de ma part de l'oublier en m'apitoyant sur mon propre sort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us then resume our journey, together...one step at a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_X00230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Reprenons ensemble notre périple, mes amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00010_LADYINWAITING2<tab>All has been arranged as you desired, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00010_LADYINWAITING2<tab>Tout a été arrangé comme vous le vouliez, Seigneur Lolorito.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00020_LOLORITO<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Y00020_LOLORITO<tab>Grmbl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Heh heh heh. Thou thinkest sanctuary lieth beyond?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu crois vraiment que tu trouveras un refuge, là-bas...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Delusion. Despair. Death. Thou shalt find naught else here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02500_Z00020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Folie, désespoir, mort... Voilà ce qui t'y attend...
